1a1('bum): @#/ /'bum ka pa bzhugs so//
1b1('bum): @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ sha ta sa ha sri ka
1b2('bum): pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA/ bod skad du/ shes rab kyi pha
1b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ glegs bam
1b4('bum): thog ma/ bam po dang po/ 'di skad bdag
2a1('bum): @##/ /gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal
2a2('bum): po'i khab kyi ri/ bya rgod phung po la dge slong lnga stong tsam gyi dge slong
2a3('bum): gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig ste/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/
2a4('bum): zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ sems shin tu
2b1('bum): rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa
2b2('bum): byas pa/ khur bor ba/ rang gi don rab tu thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba/ yongs su zad pa/ bka' yang dag pas
2b3('bum): sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad la pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa sha
2b4('bum): stag ste/ gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni/ 'di ltar slob pa rgyun du zhugs pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'o/ /
2b5('bum): dge slong ma grags 'dzin dang / skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo la sogs pa lnga brgya tsam dang / dge bsnyen pha dang /
2b6('bum): dge bsnyen ma dang / shin tu mang ba kun kyang chos mthong ba sha stag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
3a1('bum): chen po tshad med grangs med pa thams cad kyang gzungs rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/
3a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis rnam par spyod pa/ mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul can/ rtog pa med pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa/ chos thams
3a3('bum): cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa rab tu thob pa/ thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa/ bstan pa zad mi shes pa la so so
3a4('bum): yang dag par rig pa'i tshul khong du chud pa/ mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par rtse ba/ mngon par shes pa shin tu ma nyams
3a5('bum): pa| mnyan par 'os pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/ le lo med cing brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ lus dang srog la mi lta ba/ tshul 'chos
3a6('bum): pa med pa/ kha gsag med pa/ grags pa dang / khe dang / bkur sti'i sems med pa/ zang zing med pa'i chos ston pa/ chos
3b1('bum): zab mo'i bzod pa dam pa rtogs par khong du chud pa/ mi 'jigs pa chen po thob pa/ yid yongs su zhum pa med pa/ bdud kyi las thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa /
3b2('bum): las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad pa/ las dang / nyon mongs pa dang / phyir rgol ba rab tu bcom pa/ pha rol po'i rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa/ nyan thos
3b3('bum): dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par dka' ba/ chos rab tu rtogs pas rnam par dbye zhing bstan pa la mkhas pa/ bskal pa grangs med pa nas smon lam shin
3b4('bum): tu brtsams pa/ bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan pa/ thog mar smra ba/ khro gnyer med pa/ snyan cing 'jam pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/ pha rol la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs su brjod pa
3b5('bum): la mkhas pa/ spobs pa mi chod pa/ 'khor mtha' yas pa zil gyis gnon pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa/ bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas par bstan pa'i ye shes kyis
3b6('bum): 'byung ba la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / rmi lam dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / nam mkha' dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / sprul
3b7('bum): pa dang / gzugs brnyan lta bur khong du chud pa/ sems yongs su zhum pa med pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud dang / shes pa phra ba dang / spyod pa dang / mos
4a1('bum): pa khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad la sdang ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bzod pa rlabs chen po dang ldan pa/ chos
4a2('bum): thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ chos nyid zab mo dang ldan pas gting dpag dka' ba/ rang gi sems la dbang rab tu thob pa/ chos thams
4a3('bum): cad la dbang shin tu thob pa/ las dang / nyon mongs pa dang / lta ba'i sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba/ brten pa rtogs par bstan pa la mkhas pa/ rten cing
4a4('bum): 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshul zad mi shes pa la bzhugs pa/ lta ba dang / bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral ba/ kun tu sbyor ba thams cad spangs
4a5('bum): pa| las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa/ bden pa rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad sgra brnyan dang 'dra bar
4a6('bum): rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mos pa/ chos kyi tshul bstan pa tshad med pa la 'jigs pa med pa/ bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi
4a7('bum): zhing mtha' yas pa rnam par dgod pa'i smon lam gyis 'gro ba yongs su zin pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin
4b1('bum): rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mngon du gyur pa/ sangs rgyas byung ba thams cad du nye bar 'gro ba la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la gsol ba gdab par mkhas pa/ sems
4b2('bum): can gyi lta ba sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskyed pa'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa/ ting nge 'dzin brgya stong mngon par sgrub pa la rnam par rtse ba'i ye shes rtogs par bya ba la
4b3('bum): mkhas pa/ yon tan brjod pa bskal pa mtha' yas par mi zad pa dang ldan pa sha stag dang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang /
4b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen 'byung gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
4b5('bum): chen po rin chen byin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ded dpon dam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyes bus byin dang / byang chub
4b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyob sbed dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chu bdag lha dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang pos byin dang / byang chub
4b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang po'i stobs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros dam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags
5a1('bum): pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros 'phel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas
5a2('bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod mthong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib med blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
5a3('bum): chen po rab tu zhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu dam pas rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus mtha'
5a4('bum): yas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brtson pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu sbyor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
5a5('bum): chen po mi gtong brtson pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems
5a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros dpe med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu
5a7('bum): chen po thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi stobs rab tu 'joms
5b1('bum): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin chen phyag rgya dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
5b2('bum): chen po rtag tu lag brkyang dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje cher sems dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyan chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'
5b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri bo'i zom dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub
5b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / gzhan yang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gdan seng+ge'i khri
5b5('bum): bshams nas sku drang por bsrang ste dgongs pa mngon du bzhag nas skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so/ /der bzhugs nas ting nge 'dzin gang du ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'du ba dang / khongs
5b6('bum): su chud pa dang / rjes su 'brang ba dang / 'du bar 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba la mnyam par bzhag go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs shing yang dag par
5b7('bum): mkhyen pas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ 'phrul gyi spyan gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di la rnam par gzigs so/ /de ltar gzigs nas sku thams cad nas 'od zer rab tu bkye ste/
6a1('bum): de'i zhabs kyi mthil gnyis kyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa gnyis las 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /zhabs kyi sor mo bcu
6a2('bum): las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /zhabs kyi long bu gnyis las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /zhabs byin pa gnyis las
6a3('bum): kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /zhabs pus mo gnyis las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /zhabs brla gnyis las kyang 'od
6a4('bum): zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /sku sta zur gnyis las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /sku lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nas kyang 'od zer bye
6a5('bum): ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu byung ngo / /sku rtsib logs gnyis las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /thugs ka'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dpal gyi be'u
6a6('bum): las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu byung ngo / /phyag gi sor mo bcu las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /phyag lag ngar gnyis las kyang
6a7('bum): 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /sku phrag pa gnyis las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /mgur nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig
6b1('bum): brgya stong drug cu byung ngo / /tshems mche ba bzhi las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /tshems bzhi bcu las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu
6b2('bum): byung ngo / /spyan gnyis nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /snyan gnyis nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /shangs kyi sbubs gnyis
6b3('bum): nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu byung ngo / /steng gi spyi gtsug nas kyang 'od zer bye ba
6b4('bum): khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu byung ngo / /zhal gyi sgo nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu byung ste/ 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu po de dag thams cad kyis stong gsum
6b5('bum): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par byas te/ shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas
6b6('bum): so| |lho phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /nub phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab
6b7('bum): par byas so/ /byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye
7a1('bum): ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /
7a2('bum): lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi
7a3('bum): bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi
7a4('bum): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /sems can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang / 'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa
7a5('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas 'od zer rab tu dgye ba mdzad de/ 'od des kyang stong gsum gyi
7a6('bum): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /lho
7a7('bum): phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /nub phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas
7b1('bum): so| |byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba
7b2('bum): chen pos khyab par byas so/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig
7b3('bum): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so//
7b4('bum): 'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab
7b5('bum): par byas so/ /sems can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang / 'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /de nas
7b6('bum): yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad de/ shar phyogs
7b7('bum): su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/ /lho phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/ /
8a1('bum): nub phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/ /byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
8a2('bum): snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/ /shar lho'i phyogs
8a3('bum): mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen
8a4('bum): pos khyab par mdzad do/ /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/ /'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i
8a5('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/ /steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/ /sems can gang gis 'od de
8a6('bum): mthong ba dang / 'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas
8a7('bum): ljags kyi dbang po bkram ste stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad ljags kyi dbang pos khyab par mdzad nas zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /ljags kyi dbang po de
8b1('bum): las kyang 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma thon te 'od zer de dag thams cad la pad+mo mang po rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog tu snang ba/ 'dab ma
8b2('bum): stong dang ldan pa/ sna tshogs su 'dug pa/ blta na sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ kha dog bzang ba/ dri zhim pa/ 'jam pa/ ka tsa lin+ti ka ltar reg na bde bar 'gyur ba sha stag kun nas gnas par gyur
8b3('bum): te| pad+mo de dag la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid ston par mdzad de/ de dag shar phyogs kyi 'jig
8b4('bum): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyis chos ston to/ /de dag lho phyogs kyi 'jig
8b5('bum): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyis chos ston to/ /de dag nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten
8b6('bum): gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyis chos ston to/ /de dag byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten
8b7('bum): gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyis chos ston to/ /de dag byang shar gyi phyogs
9a1('bum): mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos
9a2('bum): bstan pa 'di nyid kyis chos ston to/ /de dag shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin
9a3('bum): pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyis chos ston to/ /de dag lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas 'di
9a4('bum): lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyis chos ston to/ /de dag nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs
9a5('bum): shing de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyis chos ston to/ /de dag 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
9a6('bum): snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyis chos ston to/ /de dag steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
9a7('bum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyis chos ston to/ /sems can gang gis chos de
9b1('bum): dag thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan seng+ge'i khri de la bzhugs bzhin du sangs
9b2('bum): rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin seng+ge rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba la mnyam par bzhag ste rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do/ /rdzu 'phrul de mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
9b3('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ g.yos so/ /rab tu g.yos so/ /kun tu g.yos so/ /'gul to/ /rab tu 'gul to/ /kun tu 'gul to/ /ldeg go /rab tu ldeg go /
9b4('bum): kun tu ldeg go /chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu chem chem mo/ /'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu 'ur 'ur ro/ /shig shig /rab tu shig shig /kun tu shig shig go /
9b5('bum): mtha' mtho na ni/ dbus dma'/ dbus mtho na ni/ mtha' dma' ste/ dal bus bags kyis nyams su bde bar sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba bskyed par gyur to/ /de nas de'i
9b6('bum): tshe'i skad cig yud tsam thang gcig la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten
9b7('bum): dang / mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rgyun chad par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar
10a1('bum): skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang /
10a2('bum): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to/ /de nas lha de dag dang / mi de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su
10a3('bum): dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong zhing phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
10a4('bum): la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang gcig la shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang /
10a5('bum): byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang
10a6('bum): lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so/ /de nas mi de dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran
10a7('bum): nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
10b1('bum): sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag btsal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la
10b2('bum): thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang gcig la lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol
10b3('bum): song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam
10b4('bum): par skyes so/ /de nas mi de dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa
10b5('bum): d ang | nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du
10b6('bum): dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag btsal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe
10b7('bum): skad cig yud tsam thang gcig la nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang /
11a1('bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par
11a2('bum): skyes so/ /de nas mi de dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa
11a3('bum): dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi
11a4('bum): drung du dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag btsal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/ /de nas de'i

11a6('bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang / lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes
11a7('bum): so| |de nas mi de dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos
11b1('bum): pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du
11b2('bum): dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag btsal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe skad cig
11b3('bum): yud tsam thang gcig la byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin
11b4('bum): rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so/ /de nas mi de dag dang /

11b6('bum): p a de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la
11b7('bum): phyag btsal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang gcig
12a1('bum): la shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams
12a2('bum): cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so//
12a3('bum): de nas mi de dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang /

12a5('bum): zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag btsal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe skad cig
12a6('bum): yud tsam thang gcig la lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad
12a7('bum): dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so//
12b1('bum): de nas mi de dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde
12b2('bum): b a thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas
12b3('bum): zhabs la phyag btsal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang
12b4('bum): gcig la nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i
12b5('bum): 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so/ /de nas mi de dag dang / lha
12b6('bum): de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur
12b7('bum): p a de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la
13a1('bum): phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe skad cig
13a2('bum): yud tsam thang gcig la 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i
13a3('bum): 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so/ /de nas mi de dag dang /
13a4('bum): lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur
13a5('bum): p a de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la
13a6('bum): phyag btsal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang
13a7('bum): gcig la steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i
13b1('bum): 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so/ /de nas mi de dag dang / lha de
13b2('bum): dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de
13b3('bum): d ag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag btsal
13b4('bum): te| de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
13b5('bum): khams 'di na sems can dmus long ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mig gis gzugs mthong bar gyur to/ /'on pa rnams kyang rna bas sgra thos par gyur to/ /smyon pa rnams
13b6('bum): kyang dran pa thob par gyur to/ /sems 'khrugs pa rnams kyang 'khrug pa med pa'i sems thob par gyur to/ /gos med pa rnams kyang gos thob par gyur to/ /dbul po rnams kyang nor thob
13b7('bum): par gyur to/ /bkres pa rnams kyang zas thob par gyur to/ /skom pa rnams kyang btung ba thob par gyur to/ /nad kyis btab pa rnams kyang nad med par gyur to/ /lus nyams pa dang dbang po
14a1('bum): ma tshang ba rnams kyang lus dang dbang po tshang zhing rgyas par gyur to/ /ngal ba rnams kyang ngal sos par gyur to/ /lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha'
14a2('bum): dang / 'tsho ba mi dge ba ma spangs pa rnams kyang lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang / 'tsho ba mi dge ba spangs par gyur to/ /sems can thams cad kyang sems
14a3('bum): can thams cad la dper na/ pha dang / ma dang / phu nu dang / sring mo dang / mdza' bo dang / gnyen dang / grogs po dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis sems mnyam pa nyid du gyur to/ /sems
14a4('bum): can thams cad kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan zhing tshangs par spyod pa dang / gtsang ba dang / nyes pa'i dri nga ba med de/ mi dge ba'i rtog pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur to/ /
14a5('bum): de'i tshe sems can thams cad bde ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/ dper na/ dge slong bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba de lta bu'i bde ba thams
14a6('bum): cad dang ldan par gyur to/ /de'i tshe sems can rnam pa 'di lta bu'i shes rab dang ldan par gyur te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa ni/ dge ba'o/ /dul ba ni/ dge ba'o/ /zhi ba ni/ dge ba'o/ /sdom pa
14a7('bum): ni| dge ba'o/ /bden pa ni/ dge ba'o/ /bag byed pa ni/ dge ba'o/ /byams pa ni/ dge ba'o/ /snying rje ni/ dge ba'o/ /srog chags su gyur pa thams cad la mi 'tshe ba ni/ dge ba'o/ /
14b1('bum): zhes bya bar shes par gyur to/ /de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang / kye ma sems can 'di dag 'di ltar sbyin pa ni/ dge ba'o//
14b2('bum): dul ba ni/ dge ba'o/ /zhi ba ni/ dge ba'o/ /sdom pa ni/ dge ba'o/ /bden pa ni/ dge ba'o/ /bag byed pa ni/ dge ba'o/ /byams pa ni/ dge ba'o/ /snying rje ni/ dge ba'o/ /tshangs par spyad pa spyod
14b3('bum): pa ni/ dge ba'o/ /srog chags su gyur pa thams cad la mi 'tshe ba ni/ dge ba'o/ /zhes bya bar shes pa'i shes rab de lta bu dang ldan par gyur pa ni/ ngo mtshar to/ /zhes ched du brjod pa ched du
14b4('bum): brjod do/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gdan seng+ge'i khri de nyid la bzhugs pas/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi ma sgrib pa med pa nam mkha'i dbyings yongs su dag pa la 'dug pa'am/ zla ba nya'i
14b5('bum): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab dang bcas pa/ khor yug dang bcas pa/ lha'i gnas dang bcas pa/ dbang po dang bcas pa/ dbang byed dang
14b6('bum): bcas pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi ris dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa 'di zil gyis mnan te bzhugs na/ 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang /
14b7('bum): dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di zil gyis mnan te 'od dang / sku mdog
15a1('bum): dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing / lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs pa de bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung
15a2('bum): gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so/ /de bzhin du lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten
15a3('bum): gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so/ /de bzhin du nub
15a4('bum): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs
15a5('bum): so| / de bzhin du byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/ lhan
15a6('bum): ne| lhang nger bzhugs so/ /de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang /
15a7('bum): dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so/ /de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/
15b1('bum): 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so/ /de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye
15b2('bum): ma snyed zil gyis mnan te 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so/ /de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig
15b3('bum): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so/ /de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs
15b4('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so/ /de bzhin du
15b5('bum): steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so//
15b6('bum): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab ri nag po gzhan thams cad zil gyis non par gnas pa ni/ mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
15b7('bum): skar ma'i gzugs thams cad zil gyis non par gnas pa ni/ mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od gzhan thams cad zil gyis
16a1('bum): non par gnas pa ni/ mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/
16a2('bum): dbang po dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa/ zil gyis non par bzhugs pa'ang 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis
16a3('bum): mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyi rang bzhin gyi sku
16a4('bum): ci 'dra ba de bzhin du bstan to/ /de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gtsang ma'i gnas kyi lha'i ris dang / kun snang dang ba dang / tshangs ris dang / gzhan
16a5('bum): 'phrul dbang byed dang / 'phrul dga' dang / dga' ldan dang / mtshe ma dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin
16a6('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdan seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs pa mthong nas dga' zhing spro ba dang / yid bde zhing rab tu dga' la nyams bde ba
16a7('bum): dang / yid bde ba skyes nas lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi byug spos dang / lha
16b1('bum): rdzas kyi ut+pa la dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu da dang / puN+Da rI ka dang / na li na dang / sau gan+d+hi dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog ke sa ra dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyan
16b2('bum): dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan mang po thogs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang /
16b3('bum): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / byug spos dang / ut+pa la dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu da dang / puN+Da rI ka dang / na li na dang / sau gan+d+hi dang / me tog ke sa ra dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / na bza' dang /
16b4('bum): rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor to/ /mngon par gtor to/ /rab tu gtor to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
16b5('bum): khams 'di na 'dul ba dang / snod du gyur pa'i mi ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang me tog chu las skyes pa dang / thang las skyes pa mang po khyer nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong
16b6('bum): ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par gyur to/ /me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma la sogs pa dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang /
16b7('bum): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan de dag thams cad kyang de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i steng gi nam mkha' la me tog la sogs pa'i khang
17a1('bum): pa brtsegs pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du gnas par gyur to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa de las kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /
17a2('bum): dar gyi lnga ldi mang po 'phyang bar gyur to/ /mngon par 'phyang bar gyur to/ /rab tu 'phyang bar gyur to/ /me tog dang dar gyi lnga ldi de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
17a3('bum): khams 'di shin tu mdzes par gyur to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba gser gyi kha dog lta bu des kyang shin tu mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger gyur to/ /stong
17a4('bum): g sum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des
17a5('bum): khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/ /lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/ /nub phyogs
17a6('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/ /byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye
17a7('bum): ma snyed kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bcom
17b1('bum): ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des
17b2('bum): khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/ /nub
17b3('bum): byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/ /'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
17b4('bum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/ /steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bcom ldan 'das
17b5('bum): kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/ /de la 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur
17b6('bum): te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams ji ltar sems pa de bzhin du nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi mi rnams
17b7('bum): kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas cho ga mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam
18a1('bum): mo| |shar gyi lus 'phags po'i mi rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin
18a2('bum): gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam
18a3('bum): du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta
18a4('bum): bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams
18a5('bum): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam
18a6('bum): mo/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs
18a7('bum): shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs
18b1('bum): pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur
18b2('bum): te| de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa
18b3('bum): mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
18b4('bum): lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams
18b5('bum): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam
18b6('bum): mo| |tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi
18b7('bum): mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te
19a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /snang ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog

19a3('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /
19a4('bum): tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun

19a6('bum): bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /dge ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di
19a7('bum): snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /chung dge'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta
19b1('bum): bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams

19b3('bum): snyam mo/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na

19b7('bum): mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin
20a1('bum): gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing
20a2('bum): chos ston to snyam mo/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag
20a3('bum): gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/

20a6('bum): gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo//
20a7('bum): 'og min gyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun
20b1('bum): na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /de bzhin du stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi thams cad dang / lha thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes
20b2('bum): pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi
20b3('bum): thams cad dang / lha thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun
20b4('bum): na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi thams cad dang / lha thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog
20b5('bum): mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis
20b6('bum): gdan seng+ge'i khri de la bzhugs bzhin du 'od rab tu 'gyed pa mdzad de/ yang 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu snang bar gyur to/ /shar phyogs
20b7('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to/ /lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to/ /nub phyogs kyi
21a1('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to/ / byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu
21a2('bum): snang bar gyur ro/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi
21a3('bum): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to/ /nub byang

21a6('bum): n a sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
21a7('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa mang po mthong bar gyur to/ /shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
21b1('bum): g ang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

21b3('bum): lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snying po de dag na sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na /

21b5('bum): thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/ /nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum
21b6('bum): g yi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun
21b7('bum): dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong par gyur to/ /byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na sems
22a1('bum): c an gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
22a2('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong
22a3('bum): bar gyur to/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi
22a4('bum): s tong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun
22a5('bum): dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
22a6('bum): s nyed po de dag na sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
22a7('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar
22b1('bum): gyur to/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i

22b3('bum): chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/ /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na sems can
22b4('bum): g ang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
22b5('bum): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/ /'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
22b6('bum): k hams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
22b7('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa
23a1('bum): mthong bar gyur to/ /steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang
23a2('bum): s tong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi
23a3('bum): dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
23a4('bum): snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen yod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen
23a5('bum): 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad
23a6('bum): do| / de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher
23a7('bum): g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
23b1('bum): r gyas rin chen 'byung gnas gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs la dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas de la
23b2('bum): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda'
23b3('bum): ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas kyis byang
23b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni/ nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i
23b5('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba
23b6('bum): bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni/ de'i mthu yin te/ de 'dra'o/ /de nas byang
23b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin
24a1('bum): chen 'byung gnas la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
24a2('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub bde blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
24a3('bum): chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang / so so yang dag par rig pa sgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la
24a4('bum): dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar de'i dus
24a5('bum): la bab par shes na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der song shig /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung
24a6('bum): gnas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba la pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can stong bskur te/ rigs
24a7('bum): kyi bu| bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shA kya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig / rigs kyi bu/ sangs
24b1('bum): rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/ mgu bar dka' ba yin gyi /
24b2('bum): der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
24b3('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas de las pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u
24b4('bum): dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang
24b5('bum): ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs
24b6('bum): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /
24b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/
25a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas byang chub sems dpa'
25a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
25a3('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang
25a4('bum): dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
25a5('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
25a6('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ pad+mo de dag bzhes nas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
25a7('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/ /de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad+mo
25b1('bum): de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to/ /chos bstan bde sems can gang
25b2('bum): gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang / rab tu
25b3('bum): byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
25b4('bum): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ /bkur stir byas so/ /phu dud du byas so/ /mchod par byas so// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong
25b5('bum): phrag brgya pa/ bam po gnyis pa/ de nas lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa
25b6('bum): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub
25b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa'
26a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta
26a2('bum): n a chog mi shes pa de mthong nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal gang na ba der dong ste
26a3('bum): phyin nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
26a4('bum): 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces
26a5('bum): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
26a6('bum): dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ni/ byang phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi
26a7('bum): khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub ba zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /de byang
26b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni/ de'i mthu yin te/ de 'dra'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
26b2('bum): po mya ngan med pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
26b3('bum): bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi
26b4('bum): zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang / so so yang dag par rig pa sgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting
26b5('bum): nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal
26b6('bum): pa| rigs kyi bu/ de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der songs shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
26b7('bum): rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa la pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can stong bskur te/ rigs
27a1('bum): kyi bu| bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig / rigs
27a2('bum): kyi bu| sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/ mgu bar
27a3('bum): dka' ba yin gyi/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo mya ngan med pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
27a4('bum): d ag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal de las pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim
27a5('bum): pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas lho phyogs kyi sangs
27a6('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyang ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na
27a7('bum): bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang
27b1('bum): chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen bos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub
27b2('bum): pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
27b3('bum): dpa' chen po mya ngan med pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan
27b4('bum): med pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo
27b5('bum): g ser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis
27b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad+mo de dag
27b7('bum): b zhes nas lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der
28a1('bum): gtor to/ /de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po
28a2('bum): bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to/ /chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang
28a3('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i
28a4('bum): gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la
28a5('bum): rim gror byas so/ /bkur stir byas so/ /phu dud du byas so/ /mchod pa byas so/ /de nas nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol
28a6('bum): na 'jig rten gyi khams nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro zhes bya ba bzhugs shing
28a7('bum): 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de
28b1('bum): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta na chog mi
28b2('bum): s hes pa de mthong nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das
28b3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du
28b4('bum): byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
28b5('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phros byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
28b6('bum): rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni/ shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
28b7('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol
29a1('bum): tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni/ de'i mthu yin te/ de 'dra'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis bcom ldan 'das

29b4('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro de las pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u

29b6('bum): snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs
29b7('bum): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang
30a1('bum): c hub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba
30a2('bum): der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
30a3('bum): chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
30a4('bum): rin chen 'od 'phro/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes
30a5('bum): 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin
30a6('bum): chen 'od 'phros bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
30a7('bum): shAkya thub pas/ pad+mo de dag bzhes nas nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed pho de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
30b1('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/ /de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i
30b2('bum): sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to/ /chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang
30b3('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su
