216b7('bum): chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya
217a1('bum): nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo / /zhes yongs
217a2('bum): su srung ba byed do/ /de la lus kyi skyon du bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang tshe 'di nyid la thams cad du thams cad med par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar byang
217a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
217a4('bum): dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung du
217a5('bum): 'ong ngo / /zhes yongs su srung ba mdzad do/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul
217a6('bum): dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba
217a7('bum): dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang /
217b1('bum): mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong
217b2('bum): ngo / /zhes yongs su srung ba byed do/ /de la lus kyi skyon du bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang tshe 'di nyid la thams cad du thams cad med par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di
217b3('bum): ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
217b4('bum): de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
217b5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe gzungs kyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / spobs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i sgo dag kyang tshegs mi che bar mngon du 'gyur ro/ /skye ba'i skye mched thams cad
217b6('bum): du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
217b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
218a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ 'di snyam du/ chos gang la la chos rnams dang 'du ba'am/ 'bral bar 'gyur ba'am/ 'phrad pa'am/ mi
218a2('bum): 'phrad par 'gyur ba de lta bu yod dam zhes bya bar mi sems so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos gang 'du ba'am/ 'bral bar 'gyur ba'am/ 'phrad pa'am/ mi 'phrad par
218a3('bum): 'gyur ba de lta bu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes
218a4('bum): bya'o| |shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ 'di snyam du/ bdag gis chos kyi dbyings mngon
218a5('bum): par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ram/ 'on tam mi 'gyur zhes bya bar mi sems te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings mngon par sangs rgyas pa med do/ /
218a6('bum): mngon par 'tshang rgya ba med do/ /mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba med do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes
218a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
218b1('bum): chos gang yang chos kyi dbyings dang tha dad par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha
218b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos kyi dbyings dang / chos
218b3('bum): rnams su bye brag tu bya ba mi 'byed de/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/ /shA ra dwa
218b4('bum): ti'i bu| gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ 'di snyam du/ chos kyi dbyings khong du chud par 'gyur ram/ 'on tam
218b5('bum): khong du chud par mi 'gyur zhes bya bar mi sems te/ de ni/ 'di ltar des chos gang gis chos gang khong du chud par bya ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba med do/ /
218b6('bum): de'ang 'di ltar/ de ni/ chos kyi dbyings stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor/ mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes
218b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs dang stong
219a1('bum): pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang gzugs su mi sbyor ro/ /tshor ba dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang tshor bar mi sbyor ro/ /'du shes dang stong
219a2('bum): pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang 'du shes su mi sbyor ro/ /'du byed dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang 'du byed du mi sbyor ro/ /rnam par shes pa dang stong pa nyid du mi
219a3('bum): sbyor| stong pa nyid dang rnam par shes par mi sbyor ro/ /mig dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang mig tu mi sbyor ro/ /rna ba dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang rna bar
219a4('bum): mi sbyor ro/ /sna dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang snar mi sbyor ro/ /lce dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang lcer mi sbyor ro/ /lus dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/
219a5('bum): stong pa nyid dang lus su mi sbyor ro/ /yid dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang yid du mi sbyor ro/ /gzugs dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang gzugs
219a6('bum): su mi sbyor ro/ /sgra dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang sgrar mi sbyor ro/ /dri dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang drir mi sbyor ro/ /ro dang stong pa nyid du mi
219a7('bum): sbyor| stong pa nyid dang ror mi sbyor ro/ /reg dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang reg tu mi sbyor ro/ /chos dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang chos su mi
219b1('bum): sbyor ro| |mig gi khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang mig gi khams su mi sbyor ro/ /gzugs kyi khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang gzugs kyi
219b2('bum): khams su mi sbyor ro/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi sbyor ro/ /rna ba'i khams dang stong pa
219b3('bum): nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang rna ba'i khams su mi sbyor ro/ /sgra'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang sgra'i khams su mi sbyor ro/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams
219b4('bum): dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi sbyor ro/ /sna'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang sna'i khams su mi sbyor ro/ /
219b5('bum): dri'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang dri'i khams su mi sbyor ro/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang sna'i rnam par shes
219b6('bum): pa'i khams su mi sbyor ro/ /lce'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang lce'i khams su mi sbyor ro/ /ro'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang ro'i khams
219b7('bum): su mi sbyor ro/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi sbyor ro/ /lus kyi khams dang stong pa nyid du mi
220a1('bum): sbyor| stong pa nyid dang lus kyi khams su mi sbyor ro/ /reg bya dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang reg byar mi sbyor ro/ /lus kyi rnam par
220a2('bum): shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi sbyor ro/ /yid kyi khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang
220a3('bum): yid kyi khams su mi sbyor ro/ /chos kyi khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang chos kyi khams su mi sbyor ro/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du
220a4('bum): mi sbyor| stong pa nyid dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi sbyor ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor 'di ni/ rnal 'byor dam
220a5('bum): pa ste| shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa ni/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi zhing
220a6('bum): yang yongs su dag par byed do/ /sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed do/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'ang myur du mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /shA
220a7('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnal 'byor du bya ba gang ci'ang rung ste/ de dag gi nang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor ni/ rab ces bya/ mchog ces bya/ dam pa zhes bya/ phul zhes bya/
220b1('bum): gtso bo zhes bya/ gya nom pa zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di ni/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i
220b2('bum): rnal 'byor te/ bla na med pa'i rnal 'byor to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ lung bstan pa zhes bya ba ste/ bla na med pa yang dag
220b3('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur pa'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i don byed kyang
220b4('bum): de 'di snyam du/ bdag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa yin no zhe'am/ brtson pa ma yin no zhes bya bar mi sems so/ /bdag la ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
220b5('bum): rnams lung ston pa mdzad do/ /bdag ni/ lung bstan pa la nye bar gyur to/ /bdag gis ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /bdag gis ni/ sems can rnams yongs
220b6('bum): su smin par bya'o/ /bdag gis ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o/ /snyam du mi sems so/ /de ci'i
220b7('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar de chos kyi dbyings la bye brag tu 'byed pa med de/ de ni/ chos kyi dbyings las chos gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'am/ gang la sangs rgyas
221a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis lung bstan par bya ba'am/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba de lta bu'i chos
221a2('bum): gzhan gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sems can gyi
221a3('bum): 'du shes mi skye'o/ /bdag gi 'du shes mi skye'o/ /srog gi 'du shes mi skye'o/ /'gro ba'i 'du shes mi skye'o/ /gso ba'i 'du shes mi skye'o/ /skyes bu'i 'du shes mi skye'o/ /gang zag
221a4('bum): gi 'du shes mi skye'o/ /shed can gyi 'du shes mi skye'o/ /shed bdag gi 'du shes mi skye'o/ /byed pa po'i 'du shes mi skye'o/ /tshor ba po'i 'du shes mi skye'o/ /shes pa po'i
221a5('bum): 'du shes mi skye'o/ /mthong ba po'i 'du shes mi skye'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar sems can shin tu skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa'i phyir te/ sems can la ni/ skye ba
221a6('bum): dang 'gag pa med do/ /gang la skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ji ltar 'gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub
221a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can skye ba med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ sems can stong pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
221b1('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ sems can mi dmigs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ sems can dben pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ sems
221b2('bum): can rang bzhin med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ sems can ngo bo nyid med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni/
221b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnal 'byor dam pa ste/ 'di ltar/ stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
221b4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor te/ des de ma yin pa'i rnal 'byor rnams zil gyis mnan te gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnal 'byor 'di la spyod pa'i
221b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mngon par sgrub bo/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams
221b6('bum): pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mngon par sgrub bo/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnal 'byor 'di
221b7('bum): la spyod pa ni/ ser sna'i sems mi skye'o/ /tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems dang / gnod par sems pa'i sems dang / le lo'i sems dang / 'khrug pa'i sems dang / shes rab
222a1('bum): 'chal pa'i sems mi skyed do/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / shA ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang
222a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis spyod pa de gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa lags/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas ni/ gang du skye bar
222a3('bum): 'gyur| bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis rnam par spyod pa de ni/
222a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa'am/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dang mi'i nang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes par shes par bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de la byang chub sems
222a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la rnal 'byor myur du 'grub pa ste/
222a6('bum): tshe rabs 'di 'das nas kyang chos zab mo 'di dag de la mngon du 'gyur ro/ /de nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la mnyam par gzhog go /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang
222a7('bum): dang gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu'ang skye bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
222b1('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la'ang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dga' ldan gyi
222b2('bum): lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa de ni/ tshe gcig gis thogs pa ste/ de ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la nyams pa med pa'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad
222b3('bum): kyang der ma 'dus pa med do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mi'i nang nas shi 'phos nas mi dang skal ba mnyam pa nyid du skyes pa de ni/ phyir mi ldog
222b4('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma gtogs par dbang po rtul ba yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la'ang myur du mnyam par gzhog pa ma
222b5('bum): yin no| |de la gzugs kyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyang myur du mngon du mi 'gyur ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang khyod kyis de skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
222b6('bum): po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di la snyoms par 'jug pa de/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye bar 'gyur zhes smras pa ni/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems
222b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas der
223a1('bum): 'gro ste/ nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral
223a2('bum): bar mi 'gyur ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mi mkhas pa dag /bsam gtan dang po la'ang mnyam par gzhog /bsam gtan gnyis pa
223a3('bum): la'ang mnyam par gzhog / bsam gtan gsum pa la'ang mnyam par gzhog /bsam gtan bzhi pa la'ang mnyam par gzhog cing pha rol tu phyin pa drug la'ang spyod de/ de dag
223a4('bum): bsam gtan thob pas lha tshe ring po'i nang du skyes shing / gal te mi'i nang du skye ba thob nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag la bsnyen bkur byed na'ang de dag dbang po rtul zhing
223a5('bum): dbang po mi rno ba'ang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gnyis pa la'ang mnyam par gzhog la/ shes rab kyi pha
223a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la'ang spyod de/ de dag thabs la mi mkhas pas/ bsam gtan rnams spangs nas phyir 'dod pa'i khams su skye ba yang yod de/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems
223a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang dbang po rtul ba yin te/ dbang po rno ba ma yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam
223b1('bum): gtan dang po la'ang snyoms par 'jug / bsam gtan gnyis pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /bsam gtan gsum pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /bsam gtan bzhi pa la'ang snyoms par
223b2('bum): 'jug |byams pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug / snying rje la'ang snyoms par 'jug/ dga' ba la'ang snyoms par 'jug /btang snyoms la'ang snyoms par 'jug /nam mkha' mtha'
223b3('bum): yas skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /cung zad med pa'i skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /'du shes med 'du
223b4('bum): shes med min skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la'ang snyoms par 'jug/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi la'ang snyoms par 'jug /rdzu 'phrul gyi
223b5('bum): rkang pa bzhi la'ang snyoms par 'jug / dbang po lnga la'ang snyoms par 'jug /stobs lnga la'ang snyoms par 'jug /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la'ang snyoms par 'jug /'phags
223b6('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug / snying rje chen po la'ang snyoms par 'jug ste/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de dag thabs mkhas pas/ bsam gtan gyi dbang
223b7('bum): gis mi skye/ tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa'i dbang gis mi skye/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis mi skye ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang na bzhugs
224a1('bum): shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba yod do/ /de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor dang ma bral bas/ bskal
224a2('bum): pa bzang po 'di nyid la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
224a3('bum): chen po bsam gtan dang po la'ang snyoms par 'jug / bsam gtan gnyis pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /bsam gtan gsum pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /bsam gtan
224a4('bum): bzhi pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug / byams pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /snying rje la'ang snyoms par 'jug /dga' ba la'ang snyoms par 'jug /btang snyoms la'ang snyoms
224a5('bum): par 'jug / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /cung zad med pa'i skye mched la'ang
224a6('bum): snyoms par 'jug / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing / de dag thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms
224a7('bum): par 'jug pa'i dbang gis mi skye'o/ /de dag ni/ phyir 'dod pa'i khams 'dir skyes kyang rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o/ /bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o//
224b1('bum): khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye ste/ de'ang srid pa la brkam pa'i phyir ma yin gyi/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang bsam
224b2('bum): gtan dang po la'ang snyoms par 'jug / bsam gtan gnyis pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /bsam gtan gsum pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /bsam gtan bzhi pa la'ang
224b3('bum): snyoms par 'jug / byams pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /snying rje la'ang snyoms par 'jug /dga' ba la'ang snyoms par 'jug /btang snyoms la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
224b4('bum): nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /cung zad med pa'i skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
224b5('bum): 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing / de dag thabs mkhas pas/ bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis
224b6('bum): mi skye ba'ang yod de/ de dag ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams
224b7('bum): dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba
225a1('bum): mnyam par skye ste/ de dag na gnas shing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
225a2('bum): 'das rnams kyang mnyes par byed do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag thabs mkhas pas/ bsam gtan
225a3('bum): dang po la'ang snyoms par 'jug / bsam gtan gnyis pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /bsam gtan gsum pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /bsam gtan bzhi pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /byams
225a4('bum): pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug / snying rje la'ang snyoms par 'jug /dga' ba la'ang snyoms par 'jug /btang snyoms la'ang snyoms par 'jug /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la'ang snyoms par
225a5('bum): 'jug / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /cung zad med pa'i skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug pa
225a6('bum): yod de/ de dag ni/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye'o/ /de dag de na'ang tshangs pa tshangs chen dbang chen po dang ldan pa brgya phrag bcu la dbang sgyur ba de lta bu'i sems can gyi nang
225a7('bum): na'ang mchog dam pa phul du bya bar 'gyur te/ de dag de na 'khod cing gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mngon par sangs rgyas shing / chos kyi
225b1('bum): 'khor lo bskor ba bzhugs pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rgyu zhing 'dong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la'ang chos kyi
225b2('bum): 'khor lo bskor ba'i don du gsol ba gdab pa byed do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
225b3('bum): pa la spyod pa dag thabs mkhas pas/ bsam gtan dang po la'ang snyoms par 'jug /bsam gtan gnyis pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /bsam gtan gsum pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
225b4('bum): bsam gtan bzhi pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /byams pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /snying rje la'ang snyoms par 'jug /dga' ba la'ang snyoms par 'jug /btang snyoms la'ang snyoms par 'jug /nam
225b5('bum): mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /cung zad med pa'i skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /'du shes med 'du
225b6('bum): shes med min skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'ang yongs su sgom/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi'ang yongs su sgom/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'ang yongs
225b7('bum): su sgom/ dbang po lnga'ang yongs su sgom/ stobs lnga'ang yongs su sgom/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yang yongs su sgom/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang yongs su sgom/ stong
226a1('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing de dag gi dbang gis mi skye ba'ang yod do/ /de dag sangs
226a2('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon du gyur pa rnams bsnyen bkur cing / de dag tu tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad de/ dga' ldan gyi lha dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o/ /de dag der tshe'i tshul
226a3('bum): bzhin du gnas nas dbang po ma nyams pa dang / dran zhing shes bzhin du lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bskor te mdun du byas nas 'dir skye ba bstan te bla na med pa yang
226a4('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs dag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dag kyang yod do/ / //shes rab kyi pha
226a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu gcig pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag 'dod
226a6('bum): pa'i khams su'ang mi skye/ gzugs kyi khams su'ang mi skye/ gzugs med pa'i khams su'ang mi skye bar de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
226a7('bum): sangs rgyas rnams la rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di
226b1('bum): ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag mngon par shes pa drug po de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na theg
226b2('bum): pa chen po ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i sgra'ang mi grag pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do/ /shA
226b3('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na
226b4('bum): sems can rnams kyi tshe dpag tu med pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
226b5('bum): dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra mi grag pa dang / chos kyi sgra mi grag pa dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra mi grag pa de lta bu'i
226b6('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'dong zhing / sangs rgyas kyi legs pa brjod/ chos kyi legs pa brjod/ dge 'dun gyi legs pa brjod pas/ sems can de dag kyang
226b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems dang bar gyur te/ gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa de dag tu skye bar 'gyur bar byed pa
227a1('bum): dag kyang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad bsam gtan bzhi dang /
227a2('bum): tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul
227a3('bum): gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
227a4('bum): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang thob nas de dag nam
227a5('bum): yang 'dod pa'i khams su'ang mi skye/ gzugs kyi khams su'ang mi skye/ gzugs med pa'i khams su'ang mi skye zhing / de dag tu'ang sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yod do/ /shA
227a6('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dag dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med
227a7('bum): par zhugs nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'thob pa'ang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis bla
227b1('bum): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing / mngon par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te sems can grangs med tshad med pa'i don byas
227b2('bum): nas phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos bskal pa'am
227b3('bum): bskal pa'i lhag mar gnas pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha
227b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug cing / de dag byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag dang lhan cig sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
227b5('bum): du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams blta ba dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i don du 'dong ba dag kyang yod
227b6('bum): do| |shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ bsam gtan bzhi thob pa/ tshad med pa bzhi thob pa/ gzugs med pa'i
227b7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob pa dag bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis tshul du mas rnam par rtse zhing / 'di lta ste/ bsam
228a1('bum): gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go / de dag bsam gtan dang po de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go /'gog
228a2('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go / bsam gtan gnyis pa las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par
228a3('bum): gzhog go / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go /bsam gtan gsum pa las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms
228a4('bum): par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go /bsam gtan bzhi pa las langs nas
228a5('bum): 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go /nam
228a6('bum): mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas rnam shes mtha' yas
228a7('bum): skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go /'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug
228b1('bum): pa las langs nas cung zad med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go / cung zad med pa'i skye mched las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go /'gog
228b2('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las langs nas 'gog
228b3('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go / shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa
228b4('bum): dang ldan pa rnams/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag yang dang yang du rnam par mnan cing snyoms par 'jug pa dag kyang yod
228b5('bum): do| |shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi thob pa/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi thob pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi thob pa/
228b6('bum): dbang po lnga thob pa/ stobs lnga thob pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun thob pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa thob pa/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi thob pa/ bsam gtan bzhi
228b7('bum): thob pa/ tshad med pa rnams thob pa/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams thob pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad thob pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thob pa/
229a1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa thob pa/ mngon par shes pa rnams thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin rnams thob pa/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams
229a2('bum): thob pa| de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu thob pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi thob pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad thob pa dag
229a3('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum bo thob kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par mi
229a4('bum): byed| dgra bcom pa nyid thob par mi byed/ rang byang chub thob par mi byed kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung bas/ 'phags pa'i
229a5('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa sems can rnams la yongs su ston par byed de/ sems can de dag des rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i
229a6('bum): 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba dang / rang byang chub thob par 'gyur bar byed pa dag kyang yod
229a7('bum): de| shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i ye shes gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa yin te/
229b1('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de lta bus de ltar rnam par spyod pa de dag ni/ phyir mi ldog pa yin par shes par bya'o/ /shA
229b2('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / dga' ldan gyi gnas yongs su spyod pa dag kyang yod de/ shA ra dwa ti'i
229b3('bum): bu| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/ bskal pa bzang po par shes par bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
229b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ bsam gtan bzhi thob pa/ tshad med pa bzhi thob pa/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob pa/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun thob
229b5('bum): pa| mngon par shes pa drug thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu thob pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi thob pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
229b6('bum): brgyad thob pa dag / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi khong du chud par bya ba'i don du spyod kyang bden pa bzhi rtogs par mi byed pa dag kyang yod de/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa'
229b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/ tshe gcig gis thogs par shes par bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la
230a1('bum): spyod pa dag 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'dong zhing / de dag gis sems can rnams byang chub tu yang dag par skul ba byed
230a2('bum): cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dag kyang yod de/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/ bskal pa grangs med tshad med pas/
230a3('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas
230a4('bum): shing / sems can rnams kyi don du rtag par brtson te/ nam yang gnod par 'gyur ba'i tshig mi smra/ gnod pa dang ldan pa'i lus kyi las dang / yid kyi las mi byed pa dag kyang
230a5('bum): yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu| 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / sems can gyi don la rtag tu brtson pas/ sangs rgyas
230a6('bum): kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing sems can rnams kyi ngan song gi lam gsum po rgyun gcod pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa'
230a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te sems can rnams kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad nye bar sgrub cing / zas 'dod
230b1('bum): pa rnams la zas dang / skom 'dod pa rnams la skom dang / bzhon pa 'dod ba rnams la bzhon pa dang / me tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog dang / spos 'dod pa rnams la spos dang / phreng ba
230b2('bum): 'dod pa rnams la phreng ba dang / byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa dang / mal stan 'dod pa rnams la mal stan dang / gos 'dod pa rnams la gos dang / rgyan 'dod pa rnams la rgyan dang /
230b3('bum): 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la 'tsho ba dang / khyim 'dod pa rnams la khyim gyis yongs su sdud cing 'tsho ba'i yo byad skyon med pa yongs su sgrub pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar
230b4('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te sems can rnams lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi
230b5('bum): sngom pa la rab tu 'god pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
230b6('bum): lhur byas te sems can rnams khro ba med pa dang / gnod sems med pa la rab tu 'god pa byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol
230b7('bum): tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te sems can rnams dge ba'i chos thams cad la mngon par brtson pa la rab tu 'god pa dag kyang yod do/
231a1('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur
231a2('bum): byas te sems can rnams zhi gnas rtse gcig tu bya ba dang / 'dod pa las dben pa la rab tu 'god pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
231a3('bum): dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i lus su mngon par sprul te/ sems
231a4('bum): can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams dang / byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams la ngan song thams cad las yang dag
231a5('bum): par 'da' ba'i phyir chos ston pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / sangs rgyas kyi sku
231a6('bum): ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i lus su mngon par sprul nas shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
231a7('bum): pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag
231b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub
231b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing / sems
231b3('bum): can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye
231b4('bum): ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub
231b5('bum): cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
231b6('bum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i
231b7('bum): dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya
232a1('bum): che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
232a2('bum): po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos
232a3('bum): ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang
232a4('bum): mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing /
232a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas
232a6('bum): kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems
232a7('bum): dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang
232b1('bum): rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar
232b2('bum): byed pa dag kyang yod do/ / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
232b3('bum): la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi
232b4('bum): zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems
232b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing /
232b6('bum): sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
232b7('bum): gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i
233a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha
233a2('bum): stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin
233a3('bum): gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de
233a4('bum): dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu
233a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong
233a6('bum): zhing / sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas
233a7('bum): kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i
233b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do//
233b2('bum): steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /
233b3('bum): chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs
233b4('bum): su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe
233b5('bum): gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe mi
233b6('bum): c hen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par byas te dbang po gsal zhing yongs su dag pa dang ldan par gyur nas de dag lus yongs su dag pa de dag gis skye bo mang po'i dga'
233b7('bum): ba dang / mos pa bskyed de/ de dag 'gro ba mang po'i snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong ba dang / sems can de dag kyang sems mos par gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis mthar gyis
234a1('bum): theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar
234a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe lus yongs su dag pa la bslab par bya'o/ /ngag yongs su dag pa la bslab par bya'o/ /yid yongs su dag pa la bslab par bya'o/ /
234a3('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dag dbang po shin tu gsal ba thob nas de dag dbang po shin tu gsal
234a4('bum): ba de dag gis bdag mi bstod cing gzhan mi smod pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed phyin chad/ sbyin
234a5('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ma thob kyi bar du nam yang dbul bar mi 'gyur zhing log par 'gro ba dang / ngan song
234a6('bum): du mi ltung ba dag kyang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed phyin chad/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ma thob kyi bar du nam
234a7('bum): yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi la ma mi gtong ba dag kyang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
234b1('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur nas de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la sems can rab tu 'god pa dang / sbyin pa dang /
234b2('bum): ngag snyan pas sems can yongs su sdud pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi
234b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / 'khor los bsgyur pa'i rgyal srid yongs su bzung ste 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid brgya stong du ma la gnas shing / de dag la gnas nas sangs
234b4('bum): rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma mnyes par byed de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yo byad thams cad dang / mchod pa sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu
234b5('bum): dud dang / mchod pa byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / sems can log
234b6('bum): par lta ba'i mun pa can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis snang bar byed pa dang / bdag nyid kyang nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar
234b7('bum): du sangs rgyas kyi chos snang ba de dang nam yang 'bral bar mi byed pa dag kyang yod de/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos la
235a1('bum): yang dag par byung ba yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
235a2('bum): spyod pa'i tshe kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las rnams kyi go mi dbye'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan
235a3('bum): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang lags/ ngag gi las kha na ma
235a4('bum): tho ba dang bcas pa gang lags/ yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
235a5('bum): 'di snyam du sems shing / 'di ni/ lus yin gyi/ des ni/ lus kyi las shig brtsam/ 'di ni/ ngag yin gyi/ des ni/ ngag gi las shig brtsam/ 'di ni/ yid yin gyi/ des ni/
235a6('bum): yid kyi las shig brtsam snyam na/ de ni/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las rtsom pa kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'o/ /shA ra dwa
235a7('bum): ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ni/ lus gang dang / ngag gang dang / yid gang gis 'jungs pa'i sems bskyed pa'am/ tshul
235b1('bum): khrims ngan pa'i sems bskyed pa'am/ gnod sems kyi sems bskyed pa'am/ le lo'i sems bskyed pa'am/ 'khrug pa'i sems bskyed pa'am/ shes rab 'tshal pa'i sems bskyed
235b2('bum): par bya ba de lta bu'i lus mi dmigs so/ /ngag mi dmigs so/ /sems mi dmigs so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
235b3('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe lus kyi gnas ngan len skyed pa dang / ngag gi gnas ngan len skyed pa dang / yid kyi gnas ngan len skyed pa tsam du ni/ shes par mi bya ste/ de ni/ gnas med pa'o/ /
235b4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe lus kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ngo //
235b5('bum): ngag gi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ngo / /yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lus kyi las
235b6('bum): kha na ma tho ba med pa'o/ /ngag gi las kha ma tho ba med pa'o/ /yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
235b7('bum): po lus kyi gnas ngan len sbyong ba lags/ ngag gi gnas ngan len sbyong ba lags/ yid kyi gnas ngan len sbyong ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i
236a1('bum): bu| gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus mi dmigs/ ngag mi dmigs/ sems mi dmigs na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de'i
236a2('bum): tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ba yin/ ngag gi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ba yin/ yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs
236a3('bum): su sbyong ba yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs te
236a4('bum): gnas shing / nyan thos kyi sems sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems bskyed ba med par de rtag tu rgyun mi chad par sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems nye bar gzhog
236a5('bum): na| de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus kyi gnas ngan len dang / ngag gi gnas ngan len dang / yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su dag pa zhes ngas
236a6('bum): bshad do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong zhing / sbyin pa'i pha rol
236a7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /
236b1('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag kyang yod do/ /gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
236b2('bum): po'i byang chub kyi lam gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe nam lus la dmigs
236b3('bum): pa med pa dang / ngag la dmigs pa med pa dang / yid la dmigs pa med pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs
236b4('bum): pa med pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs
236b5('bum): pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dmigs pa med pa dang /
236b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dmigs pa med par gyur pa de ni/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems
236b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam yin te/ 'di ltar chos thams cad la dmigs pa med cing blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub
237a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam de lta bus pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing nan tan byed pa de dag ni/ sus kyang thub pa med do/ /gsol
237a2('bum): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul ji lta bur spyod pa rnams thub pa ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
237a3('bum): nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs la rlom sems med pa dang / tshor ba la rlom sems med pa dang /
237a4('bum): 'du shes la rlom sems med pa dang / 'du byed la rlom sems med pa dang / rnam par shes pa la rlom sems med pa dang / mig dang gzugs la rlom sems med pa dang / rna ba
237a5('bum): dang sgra la rlom sems med pa dang / sna dang dri la rlom sems med pa dang / lce dang ro la rlom sems med pa dang / lus dang reg la rlom sems med pa dang / yid dang chos la
237a6('bum): rlom sems med pa dang / sa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / chu'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / me'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / rlung gi khams la rlom
237a7('bum): sems med pa dang / nam mkha'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / mig gi khams la rlom sems med pa dang /
237b1('bum): gzugs kyi khams la rlom sems med pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / rna ba'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / sgra'i khams la
237b2('bum): rlom sems med pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / sna'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / dri'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang /
237b3('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / lce'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / ro'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams
237b4('bum): la rlom sems med pa dang / lus kyi khams la rlom sems med pa dang / reg bya'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems
237b5('bum): med pa dang / yid kyi khams la rlom sems med pa dang / chos kyi khams la rlom med pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / rten cing
237b6('bum): 'brel bar 'byung ba la rlom sems med pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang / bzod
237b7('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang /
238a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang /
238a2('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la rlom
238a3('bum): sems med pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems
238a4('bum): med pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rlom sems med
238a5('bum): pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa
238a6('bum): dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rlom sems med
238a7('bum): pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang /
238b1('bum): dbang po lnga la rlom sems med pa dang / stobs lnga la rlom sems med pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la rlom sems med pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la
238b2('bum): rlom sems med pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang /
238b3('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la rlom sems med pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
238b4('bum): la rlom sems med pa dang / stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa la rlom sems med pa dang / smon pa med pa la rlom sems med pa dang / mngon par shes
238b5('bum): pa rnams la rlom sems med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la rlom sems med pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rlom sems med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la
238b6('bum): rlom sems med pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / byams pa chen po la rlom sems med pa dang /
238b7('bum): snying rje chen po la rlom sems med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la rlom sems med pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rlom sems med pa dang / lan
239a1('bum): gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rlom sems med pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rlom sems med pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la rlom sems
239a2('bum): med pa dang / rang byang chub la rlom sems med pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rlom sems
239a3('bum): med pa dang / 'khor ba la rlom sems med pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la rlom sems med par gyur pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ pha rol tu
239a4('bum): phyin pa drug gis rnam par 'phel ba yin te/ sus kyang thub pa med do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug
239a5('bum): la gnas te thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed cing / ye shes dang ldan pas nam yang ngan song rnams su mi skye/ mi dbul zhing phongs pa rnams
239a6('bum): su myong bar mi 'gyur te/ lus gang dang ldan pas lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang na smad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba dag
239a7('bum): kyang yod do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems
239b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam yang ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ba dang / mi dbul zhing phongs pa nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lus gang dang ldan pas/ lha dang / mi
239b2('bum): dang / lha ma yin gyi nang na smad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
239b3('bum): stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de
239b4('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo / /chos kyang nyan to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs
239b5('bum): rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
239b6('bum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo / /chos kyang nyan to/ /byang chub sems
239b7('bum): dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ nub
240a1('bum): p hyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i
240a2('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo / /chos kyang nyan to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo / /byang chub sems

240a4('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo / /chos kyang nyan to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang
240a5('bum): mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin
240a6('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo / /chos kyang nyan to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas
240a7('bum): kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi
240b1('bum): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo / /chos kyang nyan to/ /byang chub sems

240b5('bum): dang ldan pas ni/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung
240b6('bum): gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo / /chos kyang nyan to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye bdag kyang mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' sems

241a5('bum): shes mi skyed do/ /dge 'dun gyi 'du shes mi skyed do/ /nyan thos kyi 'du shes mi skyed do/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes mi skyed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes mi skyed do/ /
241a6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes mi skyed do/ /bdag gi 'du shes mi skyed do/ /gzhan gyi 'du shes mi skyed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes mi skyed do/ /ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i
241a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
241b1('bum): de| tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
241b2('bum): de| brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
241b3('bum): la spyod de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid sgom ste/ nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid sgom ste/ phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /phyi
241b4('bum): nang stong pa nyid sgom ste/ phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom ste/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /chen po stong pa nyid sgom ste/ chen po stong
241b5('bum): pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/ don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom ste/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /'dus ma
241b6('bum): byas stong pa nyid sgom ste/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /thog ma dang tha ma
241b7('bum): med pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /rang bzhin stong
242a1('bum): pa nyid sgom ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgom ste/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /rang gi mtshan

242a3('bum): pa nyid sgom ste/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom ste/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom
242a4('bum): ste| dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi dmigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom
242a5('bum): ste| yang dag par spong ba rnams mi dmigs so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi dmigs so/ /dbang po lnga sgom ste/ dbang po rnams mi dmigs
242a6('bum): so| |stobs lnga sgom ste/ stobs rnams mi dmigs so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi dmigs so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan
242a7('bum): lag brgyad pa sgom ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgom ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi dmigs so/ /

242b6('bum): sgom ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi dmigs so/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi sgom ste/ mi 'jigs pa rnams mi dmigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sgom ste/ so
242b7('bum): so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi dmigs so/ /byams pa chen po sgom ste/ byams pa chen po mi dmigs so/ /snying rje chen po sgom ste/ snying po chen po mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas

243a4('bum): shes pa nyid sgom ste/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgom ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i
243a5('bum): bu| 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes te/ ye shes de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
243a6('bum): cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
243a7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mig lnga rab tu 'thob pa dang / yongs su sbyong ba yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sha'i mig dang / lha'i mig dang /

243b4('bum): dpag tshad sum brgya mthong ba yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis dpag tshad bzhi brgya mthong ba yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub

244a1('bum): brgya mthong ba yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis dpag tshad stong mthong ba yod do/ /shA ra dwa
