244a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/
244b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi
244b2('bum): lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /dga' ldan gyi
244b3('bum): lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /gzhan
244b4('bum): 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab
244b5('bum): tu shes so/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams kyi mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub
244b6('bum): sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /snang ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub
244b7('bum): sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /chung snang gi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de
245a1('bum): ni| byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /dge ba'i
245a2('bum): lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /chung dge'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /
245a3('bum): tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab
245a4('bum): tu shes so/ /che ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ chung che'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab
245a5('bum): tu shes so/ /tshad med che ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang
245a6('bum): chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin
245a7('bum): pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha
245b1('bum): rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /'og min gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /sha ra dwa
245b2('bum): ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
245b3('bum): lha'i mig de ni/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub
245b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ 'phrul dga'i lha
245b5('bum): rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
245b6('bum): chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /
245b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ tshangs
246a1('bum): chen gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ snang ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub sems
246a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ chung snang gi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams kyis mi
246a3('bum): shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig
246a4('bum): de ni| dge ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ chung dge'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems
246a5('bum): dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /
246a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ che ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ chung che'i lha rnams
246a7('bum): kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ tshad med che ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i
246b1('bum): mig de ni/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ mi che ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'
246b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyis mi
246b3('bum): shes so| |byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ 'og
246b4('bum): min gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes te/ lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems
246b5('bum): can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so/ /lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i
246b6('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so/ /lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ nub phyogs kyi
246b7('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'bo dang skye ba rab tu shes so/ /lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
247a1('bum): ni/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so/ /lha'i mig de lta bu dang
247a2('bum): ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang
247a3('bum): skye ba rab tu shes so/ /lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
247a4('bum): kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so/ /lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig
247a5('bum): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so/ /lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
247a6('bum): ni| nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so/ /lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang
247a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so/ /lha'i mig
247b1('bum): de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes
247b2('bum): so| |shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig yongs su dag pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/
247b3('bum): bam po bcu gnyis pa/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
247b4('bum): bka' stsal ba/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi mig gang dang ldan pas 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas sam/ dge ba'am/ mi dge ba'am/
247b5('bum): kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'am/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'am/ 'jig rten pa'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'am/ zag
247b6('bum): pa dang bcas pa'am/ zag pa med pa'i chos gang yang mi shes pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi mig gang dang ldan pas/ chos gang yang ma mthong ba med/ ma thos pa med/ ma bsam pa
247b7('bum): med| khong du ma chud pa med pa 'di ni/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang
248a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
248a2('bum): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi mig gis gang zag 'di ni/ dad pa'i rjes su 'gro ba/ gang zag 'di ni/ chos kyi rjes su 'gro ba/ gang zag 'di
248a3('bum): ni| stong pa nyid la gnas pa ste/ gang zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyis skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par
248a4('bum): 'gyur ro/ /de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / the tshom
248a5('bum): dang | tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs snyems pa'i kun tu sbyor ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te/ gang zag 'di ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /des sgom pa'i lam rab tu
248a6('bum): thob nas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / ngan sems rab tu srab par byed de/ gang zag 'di ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'o/ /de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms nas
248a7('bum): 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems rab tu spong ba thob par byed de/ gang zag 'di ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'o/ /de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms pas gzugs
248b1('bum): kyi 'dod chags dang / gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang / ma rig pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgod pa rab tu spong ste/ gang zag 'di ni/ dgra bcom pa'o/ /gang zag 'di ni/ mtshan ma
248b2('bum): med pa la gnas pa ste/ gang zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pas skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ma
248b3('bum): thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / the tshom dang / tshul khrims
248b4('bum): dang brtul zhugs snyems pa'i kun tu sbyor ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te/ gang zag 'di ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /des sgom pa'i lam rab tu thob nas 'dod pa'i 'dod
248b5('bum): chags dang / ngan sems rab tu srab par byed de/ gang zag 'di ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'o/ /de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms nas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems
248b6('bum): rab tu spong ba thob par byed de/ gang zag 'di ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'o/ /de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms pas gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang / gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang /
248b7('bum): ma rig pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgod pa rab tu spong ste/ gang zag 'di ni/ dgra bcom pa'o/ /gang zag 'di ni/ smon pa med pa la gnas pa ste/ gang zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni/ rnam par
249a1('bum): thar ba'i sgo smon pa med pas skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i
249a2('bum): ye shes mthong bar skye bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / the tshom dang / tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs snyems pa'i kun tu sbyor
249a3('bum): ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te/ gang zag 'di ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /des sgom pa'i lam rab tu thob nas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / ngan sems rab tu srab par
249a4('bum): byed de/ gang zag 'di ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'o/ /de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms pas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems rab tu spong ba thob par
249a5('bum): byed de/ gang zag 'di ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'o/ /de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms pas gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang / gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang / ma rig
249a6('bum): pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgod pa rab tu spong ste/ gang zag 'di ni/ dgra bcom pa'o/ /zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
249a7('bum): dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang ci'ang rung ste/ kun 'byung ba'i chos can
249b1('bum): de thams cad ni/ 'gog pa'i chos can no/ /zhes bya bar shes pas/ dad pa la sogs pa dbang po lnga 'thob par 'gyur te/ 'di ni/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
249b2('bum): dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi mig gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
249b3('bum): chen po 'di ni/ sems dang po bskyed pa ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /brtson 'grus
249b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de'i rgyus dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang
249b5('bum): ldan te/ thabs mkhas pas ched du bsam ste lus yongs su 'dzin pa byed do/ /dge ba'i rtsa bas brtan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni/ rgyal rigs che zhing
249b6('bum): mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o/ /bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o/ /khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i nang du skye'o/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i
249b7('bum): nang du skye'o/ /mtshe ma'i lha'i nang du skye'o/ /dga' ldan gyi lha'i nang du skye'o/ /'phrul dga'i lha'i nang du skye'o/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du skye'o/ /de de dag na gnas shing sems
250a1('bum): can rnams yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis de dag la rim gro byed par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs
250a2('bum): su dag par byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la'ang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/ /rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu
250a3('bum): dud dang / mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni/ bla na med pa yang dag
250a4('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
250a5('bum): dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni/ bla
250a6('bum): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'o/ /'di ni/ lung ma bstan pa'o/ /'di ni/ nges pa'o/ /'di ni/ ma nges pa'o/ /'di ni/ lung bstan par 'gyur ba'o//
250a7('bum): 'di ni/ lung bstan par mi 'gyur ba'o/ /'di dag ni/ phyir mi ldog pa ste/ dbang po thob pa'o/ /'di dag ni/ phyir mi ldog pa ma yin pa ste/ dbang po ma thob pa'o/ /'di ni/ mngon
250b1('bum): par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /'di ni/ mngon par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni/ mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pas/
250b2('bum): shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do//
250b3('bum): rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed do/ /lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
250b4('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do/ /rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed do/ /nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye
250b5('bum): ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do/ /rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod
250b6('bum): par byed do/ /byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
250b7('bum): mnyes par byed do/ /rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par byed do/ /byang shar gyi phyogs kyi mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song
251a1('bum): zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do/ /rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud
251a2('bum): dang / mchod pa byed do/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
251a3('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do/ /rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed do/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung
251a4('bum): gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do/ /rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang /
251a5('bum): mchod pa byed do/ /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
251a6('bum): sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do/ /rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed do/ /'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song
251a7('bum): zhing | de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do/ /rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed
251b1('bum): do| |steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed
251b2('bum): do| / rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed do/ /'dis ni/ mngon par shes pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /'dis ni/ mngon par shes pa thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /'di ni/
251b3('bum): bzod pa thob pa'o/ /'di ni/ bzod pa thob pa ma yin no/ /'di ni/ dbang po thob pa'o/ /'di ni/ dbang po thob pa ma yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi
251b4('bum): zhing ni/ yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni/ yongs su dag par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
251b5('bum): 'di ni/ smon lam chen po dang ldan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni/ smon lam chen po dang mi ldan pa'o/ /'dis ni/ sems can yongs su smin par byas so/ /
251b6('bum): 'dis ni/ sems can yongs su smin par ma byas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di la ni/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs
251b7('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'di la legs pa brjod pa mdzad do/ /'di la ni/ legs pa brjod pa mi mdzad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom
252a1('bum): ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /'di dag ni/ nye bar gnas par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni/
252a2('bum): byang chub thob nas tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ /'di'i tshe ni/ dpag tu yod par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i 'od dang / dbyangs dang / dge slong gi
252a3('bum): dge 'dun ni/ tshad med par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni/ tshad yod par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
252a4('bum): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni/ ldan par mi 'gyur ro/ /'di ni/ dka' ba spyod par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni/ spyod
252a5('bum): par mi 'gyur ro/ /'di ni/ srid pa tha ma pa'o/ /'di ni/ srid pa tha ma pa ma yin no/ /'di ni/ snying po byang chub la 'dug par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni/ 'dug par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub
252a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag la ni/ bdud yod par mi 'gyur ro/ /'di dag la ni/ bdud yod par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ de ltar na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang
252a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi
252b1('bum): mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi sems kyi rjes la rdo rje lta bu'i
252b2('bum): ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/ /de na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan pa yin/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan
252b3('bum): pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ldan pa yin/ byams pa chen po dang ldan pa yin/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin/ dga' ba chen po dang ldan pa yin/ gtang
252b4('bum): snyoms chen po dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa bsgribs pa med pa dang ldan pa yin/ de ni/ de'i mig ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig de dang
252b5('bum): ldan pas/ rnam pa thams cad du ma mthong ba'am/ ma thos pa'am/ ma shes pa'am/ khong du ma chud pa gang yang med de/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
252b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar byang chub sems
252b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig lnga yongs su sbyang par 'dod pa dang / thob par 'dod pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson par bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
253a1('bum): ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug tu dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/ nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
253a2('bum): chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ la la zhig yang dag par smra bas/ dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus zhes brjod pa zhig tu dgos
253a3('bum): na| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par smra bas brjod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mig lnga skyed pa'o/ /mig lnga po de dag
253a4('bum): la bslab pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ shes rab
253a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu 'thob ste/ de rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa du ma
253a6('bum): nyams su myong bar byed do/ /de ni sa chen po 'di'ang rab tu g.yo bar byed do/ /gcig tu gyur cing mang por 'gyur ro/ /mang por gyur cing gcig tu 'gyur ro/ /snang ba dang mi snang ba'ang
253a7('bum): nyams su myong bar byed do/ /rtsig pa las thal ba dang / ra ba las thal ba dang / ri las thal bar thogs pa med pa'i lus kyis 'gro ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' la'ang skyil mo
253b1('bum): krung gis 'gro ste/ dper na/ 'dab chags bya bzhin no/ /sa la'ang gyen du 'byung ba dang / 'og tu 'dzul ba byed do/ /dper na/ chu la bya ba bzhin no/ /chu la'ang 'bying ba med par 'gro ste/
253b2('bum): dper na/ sa la bya ba bzhin no/ /du bar 'thul zhing mer 'bar te/ dper na/ me'i phung po chen po bzhin no/ /nyi ma zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che la 'di ltar mthu che zhing 'di ltar dbang che ba dag kyang
253b3('bum): lag pas byugs shing tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du lus kyis dbang bsgyur te rdzu 'phrul des rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /
253b4('bum): rang bzhin gyis dben pa dang / rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir des rdzu 'phrul gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul de lta bu mi dmigs te/ de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid
253b5('bum): la bya ba ma gtogs par rdzu 'phrul lam rdzu 'phrul mngon par sgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
253b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no/ /de lha'i rna ba'i khams rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas
253b7('bum): lha dang mi gnyis ka'i sgra thos te/ lha'i rna ba'i khams des bdag ni sgra nyan ces bya bar rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do/ /de ni 'di ltar des rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben
254a1('bum): pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir rna ba dang sgrar dmigs pa med de/ de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par lha'i rna ba'i
254a2('bum): khams la bsam pa'ang mi skyed do/ /de ltar na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe lha'i rna ba'i khams
254a3('bum): mngon du bya pa'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no/ /des sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi sems sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
254a4('bum): du rab tu shes so/ /'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems la 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /'dod chags dang bral
254a5('bum): ba'i sems la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems la zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems zhes
254a6('bum): bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems la zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/
254a7('bum): gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems la gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /gti mug dang bral ba'i sems la gti mug
254b1('bum): dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems la sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
254b2('bum): du rab tu shes so/ /sred pa dang bral ba'i sems la sred pa dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i sems
254b3('bum): la nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /nye bar len pa med pa'i sems la nye bar len pa med pa'i sems zhes bya
254b4('bum): bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /kun nas 'dus pa'i sems la kun nas 'dus pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /rnam
254b5('bum): par 'phros pa'i sems la rnam par 'phros pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /rgya chung ba'i sems la rgya chung ba'i sems zhes bya bar
254b6('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /rgya che ba'i sems la rgya che ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /yangs pa'i sems la
254b7('bum): yangs pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /che bar gyur pa'i sems la che bar gyur pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
255a1('bum): shes so/ /tshad med pa'i sems la tshad med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems
255a2('bum): la mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems la mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang
255a3('bum): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /rnam par grol ba'i sems la rnam par grol ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /rnam par ma grol
255a4('bum): ba'i sems la rnam par ma grol ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems la zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang
255a5('bum): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /zag pa med pa'i sems la zag pa med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /nyon mongs pa dang bcas
255a6('bum): pa'i sems la nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems la nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems zhes
255a7('bum): bya bar yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /bla na yod pa'i sems la bla na yod pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /bla na med pa'i sems la
255b1('bum): bla na med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes to/ gzhan gyi sems shes pa des rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do/ /de ni/ 'di ltar sems de nyid bsam gyis mi
255b2('bum): khyab pa'i phyir te/ de ni/ bdag gis shes so/ /zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/ /'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir gang gis rlom
255b3('bum): sems su 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems mi dmigs te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par sems shes par bya ba'i bsam pa'am/ sems shes pa mngon par sgrub
255b4('bum): pa'i bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can thams cad kyi sems
255b5('bum): dang / spyod pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no/ /de ni/ sngon kyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes rnam pa du
255b6('bum): ma mngon par sgrub ste/ sems gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas sems brgya'i par du'ang rjes su dran no/ /nyi ma gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas nyi ma brgya'i bar du'ang rjes su dran no/ /zla ba gcig
255b7('bum): rjes su dran pa nas zla ba brgya'i bar du'ang rjes su dran no/ /lo gcig rjes su dran pa nas lo brgya'i par du'ang rjes su dran no/ /bskal pa gcig rjes su dran pa nas bskal pa brgya'i bar du'ang rjes
256a1('bum): su dran no/ /bskal pa brgya phrag du ma'ang rjes su dran no/ /bskal pa stong phrag du ma'ang rjes su dran no/ /bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma'ang rjes su dran no//
256a2('bum): bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'ang rjes su dran te/ bdag de lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug ste/ ming ni/ 'di zhes bya/ rus ni/ 'di zhes bya/ rigs ni/ 'di zhes bya/ kha zas ni
256a3('bum): 'di lta bu zhig za za/ yun ni/ 'di srid cig tu 'dug 'dug /tshe'i mtha' ni/ 'di tsam zhig tu gyur ste| de ltar bdag de nas shi 'phos nas ni che ge mo zhig tu skyes so/ /zhes bya ba
256a4('bum): nas de nas shi 'phos nas ni/ 'dir skyes so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam pa dang bcas/ gtan tshigs dang bcas/ dan rtags dang bcas par bdag dang gzhan gyi gnas rnam pa du mar rjes su
256a5('bum): dran te/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes des kyang rlom sems du 'gyur ba med do/ /de ni/ 'di ltar ye shes de ye shes ma yin te/ bsam
256a6('bum): gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de ni/ bdag gis rab tu shes so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/ /'di ltar des ye shes de nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin
256a7('bum): ma skyes pa'i phyir gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ye shes mi dmigs so/ /de ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par rjes su dran pa'i ye shes kyi don du
256b1('bum): bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon
256b2('bum): du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no/ /de ni/ lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas/ sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / kha dog sdug pa dang /
256b3('bum): kha dog mi sdug pa dang / bzang pa dang / ngan pa dang / ngan song na gnas pa dang / bde 'gro na gnas pa dag kyang rab tu shes te/ sems can 'di dag ni/ lus kyis ngan du spyod pa dang
256b4('bum): ldan| ngag gis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan/ yid kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa/ log par lta ba rnams te/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas
256b5('bum): ngan song dang / ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye'o/ /sems can 'di dag ni/ lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan/ ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan/ yid
256b6('bum): kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa mi 'debs pa/ yang dag par lta ba rnams te/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du
256b7('bum): skye bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ de ltar phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa dag gi 'gro ba drug tu
257a1('bum): gtogs pa rnams kyi skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ des kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do/ /de ni/ 'di ltar
257a2('bum): mig de mig ma yin zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir te/ de bdag gis mthong ngo / /zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/ /de'ang 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa
257a3('bum): dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba'i mig de lta bu des mi dmigs te/ de ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa ma gtogs par lha'i mig
257a4('bum): gi bsam pa'am/ lha'i mig mngon par sgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
257a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / lha'i mig mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no/ /de ni/ zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes
257a6('bum): pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub kyang nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis thob par mi byed do/ /gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos kyang
257a7('bum): gang yang mi mthong ngo / /de mngon par shes pa des rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob par byas nas bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu spong ba byed do//
257b1('bum): zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba mngon par shes pa des rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do/ /de ni/ 'di ltar ye shes de nyid ye shes ma yin zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir te/ de
257b2('bum): bdag gis rab tu shes so/ /zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/ /de'ang 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir gang gis rlom sems
257b3('bum): su 'gyur ba'i zag pa zad pa'i ye shes mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa de lta bu mi dmigs so/ /de ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par zag pa
257b4('bum): zad pa'i ye shes kyi bsam pa'am/ zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
257b5('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa'
257b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod cing / mngon par shes pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis
257b7('bum): rnam par 'phel lo/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
258a1('bum): shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir chags pa med pa'i sems nye bar bzung bas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang
258a2('bum): yod do| |shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
258a3('bum): shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ltung ba bya ba med pa nye bar bzung bas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar
258a4('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
258a5('bum): kyi phyir mi 'khrug pa nye bar bzung bas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
258a6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir lus dang sems kyi
258a7('bum): brtson 'grus mi gzhig pa nye bar bzung bas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa'
258b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'khrug pa med pa'i sems nye
258b2('bum): bar bzung bas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong bdag kyang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
258b3('bum): spyod pa'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir shes rab 'chal ba'i sems mi dmigs pa nye bar bzung bas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
258b4('bum): lam sbyong bdag kyang yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das
258b5('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa nye bar bzung ba dang / yongs su 'dzin pa med pa nye bar bzung pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam yongs su sbyong ba yin no/ /de la
258b6('bum): sbyin pa ni/ yongs su 'dzin pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags so/ /tshul khrims ni/ tshul khrims ngan pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags so/ /bzod pa ni/ 'khrug pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags so/ /brtson
258b7('bum): 'grub ni/ le lo nye bar bzung ba las gdags so/ /ting nge 'dzin ni/ mnyam par ma bzhag pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags so// shes rab ni/ shes rab 'chal ba nye bar bzung ba las gdags te/ de ni/
259a1('bum): rgal to zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/ /ma rgal to zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/ /sbyin pa byed do zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/ /sbyin pa mi byed do zhes bya bar rlom sems
259a2('bum): med do| |tshul khrims dang ldan no zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/ /tshul khrims ngan pa can no zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/ /bzod pa phun sum tshogs so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/ /khro ba can no
259a3('bum): zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/ /brtson 'grus brtsams pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/ /le lo can no zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/ /mnyam par bzhag pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//
259a4('bum): mnyam par ma bzhag pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/ /shes rab dang ldan no zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/ /shes rab 'chal pa can no zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/ /spyos so zhes bya
259a5('bum): bar rlom sems med do/ /phyag byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/ /rim gro byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/ /rim gro ma byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa
259a6('bum): ti'i bu| ma skyes pa ni/ spyos so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/ /phyag byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/ /rim gro byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/ /rim gro ma byas so zhes bya bar rlom
259a7('bum): sems med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ rlom sems thams cad yang dag par gcod pa'i phyir te/ 'di la shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
259b1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe yon tan ji snyed cig yod pa de dag ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la med de/ de yon tan 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par byed
259b2('bum): ba'i tshe sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par byed do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub
259b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems bskyed de/ sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed
259b4('bum): nas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rab tu 'thob bo/ /chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rab tu thob nas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la sems can thams cad rab tu 'god do/ /de ni/ tshe 'di nyid la'ang
259b5('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs su byon cing dben par bya ba yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan thos thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang yid
259b6('bum): du 'ong zhing dben par bya ba yin/ de ni/ skye ba gang dang gang du skyes kyang de dang de dag tu nam yang mig gis yid du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs mi mthong ngo / /rna bas yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra mi thos so/ /snas yid du mi
259b7('bum): 'ong ba'i dri mi tshor ro/ /lces yid du mi 'ong ba'i ro mi myong ngo / /lus kyis yid du mi 'ong ba'i reg bya mi reg go /yid kyis yid du mi 'ong ba'i chos rnam par rig pa med do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems
260a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /
260a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe dge slong sum brgyas gos gyon gyon pa bcom ldan 'das la yon du gsol te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
260a3('bum): bskyed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
260a4('bum): btsugs te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de log sa su thal mo sbyar bas btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
260a5('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ rgyu dang rkyen ma mchis par bzhad pa mi mdzad na/ ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe
260a6('bum): dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo/ dge slong sum brgya po 'di dag ni/ bskal pa drug cu rtsa gcig 'das nas bskal pa dpe skad ma lta bu la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
260a7('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal chen po zhes bya ba sha stag 'jig rten du 'byung ngo / /'di dag ni/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
260b1('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi sgul pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye'o/ /'dod pa la spyod pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag drug cus kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ de dag kyang de bzhin
260b2('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nyid du rab tu byung nas tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa
260b3('bum): des kyang de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i tshe 'khor bzhi po de dag ni/ 'di na 'khod bzhin du shar phyogs kyi sangs
260b4('bum): rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to/ /lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to/ /nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to/ /byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams
260b5('bum): kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to/ /nub byang gi phyogs
260b6('bum): mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to/ /'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to/ /steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sangs
260b7('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba gang ji lta bur mthong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba de dag ni/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi
261a1('bum): khams 'di ni yod par ma mthong ngo / /de nas 'khor de'i nang nas srog chags stong phrag bcus bdag cag gis las gang byas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu skye bar
261a2('bum): 'gyur ba de lta bu'i las spyod par bya'o/ /zhes smon lam btab bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu de dag gi bsam pa thugs su chud nas zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan
261a3('bum): pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das gang na de logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud de bcom
261a4('bum): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ rgyu dang rkyen ma mchis par bzhad pa mi mdzad na/ ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis zhal 'dzum pa
261a5('bum): mdzad| bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ srog chags stong phrag bcu po 'di dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
261a6('bum): stsal pa| dga' bo/ srog chags stong phrag bcu po 'di dag na/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
261a7('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang yang nam du'ang mi 'bral te/ phyi ma'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba sha
261b1('bum): stag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa maung+ga la chen po'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa bshes pa'i bu gang po dang /
261b2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / dge slong gzhan dag kun kyang mngon par shes pa shin tu mang ba dag dang | byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu mang ba dag dang / dge slong
261b3('bum): pha dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen pha dang / dge bsnyen ma shin tu mang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
261b4('bum): phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems
261b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha
261b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa dam pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das//
261b7('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phul lo/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
262a1('bum): ni| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog go / bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub
262a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gya nom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
262a3('bum): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzang po'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bla na ma mchis
262a4('bum): pa'o| |bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltag na ma mchis pa'o /bcom ldan 'das/
262a5('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
262a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
262a7('bum): ni| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dra ba ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
262b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
262b2('bum): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nam mkha' 'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang gi
262b3('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos thams
262b4('bum): cad stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid
262b5('bum): stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs
262b6('bum): pa'o| |bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa'o/ /bcom
262b7('bum): ldan 'das| 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thug pa ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha
263a1('bum): tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbyin pa yongs su btang ngo / /yongs su gtong ngo / /yongs
263a2('bum): su gtong bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/ /yongs su rdzogs so/ /yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de'i slad du mi mnyam pa
263a3('bum): dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to/ /thob bo//
263a4('bum): 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshul khrims bsrungs
263a5('bum): so| |srung ngo / /srung bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/ /yongs su rdzogs so/ /yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de'i slad
263a6('bum): du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par
263a7('bum): gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i
263b1('bum): bzod pa bsgoms so/ /sgom mo/ /sgom par 'gyur ro/ /de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/ /yongs su rdzogs so/ /yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /
263b2('bum): de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
263b3('bum): thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni/ mi mnyam pa dang
263b4('bum): mnyam pa'i brtson 'grus brtsams so/ /rtsom mo/ /rtsom par 'gyur ro/ /de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/ /yongs su rdzogs so/ /yongs su
263b5('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de'i slad du mi mnyam pa nyams pa'i lus thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
263b6('bum): pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to/ /thob bo /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni/ mi mnyam
263b7('bum): pa dang mnyam pa'i bsam gtan bskyed do/ /skyed do/ /skyed par 'gyur ro/ /de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/ /yongs su
264a1('bum): rdzogs so/ /yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de'i
264a2('bum): slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes
264a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms so/ /
264a4('bum): sgom mo/ /sgom par 'gyur ro/ /de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/ /yongs su rdzogs so/ /yongs su rdzogs
264a5('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ bla
264a6('bum): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad
264a7('bum): pas/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i gzugs thob par gyur to/ /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshor ba thob par gyur to/ /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i 'du shes thob par gyur to//
264b1('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i 'du byed thob par gyur to/ /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rnam par shes pa thob par gyur to/ /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i byang chub tu mngon par byang
264b2('bum): chub nas mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyur to/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad pas/
264b3('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i gzugs thob par gyur to/ /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshor ba thob par gyur to/ /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i 'du shes thob par gyur to/ /mi mnyam pa dang
264b4('bum): mnyam pa'i 'du byed thob par gyur to/ /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rnam par shes pa thob par gyur to/ /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i byang chub tu mngon par byang chub nas mi mnyam pa
264b5('bum): dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyur to/ /ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad pas/ mi mnyam pa dang
264b6('bum): mnyam pa'i gzugs 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshor ba 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i 'du shes 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
264b7('bum): pa'i 'du byed 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rnam par shes pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i byang chub tu mngon par byang chub nas mi mnyam
265a1('bum): pa dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
265a2('bum): 'di nyid la spyad pas/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i gzugs thob par gyur to/ /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshor ba thob par gyur ro/ /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i 'du shes thob
265a3('bum): par gyur to/ /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i 'du byed thob par gyur to/ /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rnam par shes pa thob par gyur to/ /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i byang chub tu
265a4('bum): mngon par byang chub nas/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyur to/ /de lta lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
265a5('bum): po chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'tshal bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes
265a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa de dag ni/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi ba lags so/ /de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das
265a7('bum): kyis nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che po de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de de bzhin no/ /de de
265b1('bum): bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa bzhin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa dag ni/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
265b2('bum): rten gyis phyag bya bar 'os pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/ mi'i 'jig rten 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i 'jig rten 'jig rten du 'byung bar

272a6('bum): me tog la sogs pa de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa gru bzhi/ ka ba
272a7('bum): bzhi dang ldan pa/ cha kun tu mnyam pa/ shin tu rnam par phye ba/ mdangs dga' zhing yid du 'ong bar red de 'dug go /de nas 'khor de'i nang nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig
272b1('bum): brgya stong du ma stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar bas btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang ma 'ongs
272b2('bum): p a'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gang brnyes par gyur pa'i chos kyi rnam pa de lta bu thams cad thob par gyur te nyan thos kyi dge
272b3('bum): 'dun 'di lta bu ni/ yongs su bsdu bar bgyi'o/ /da ltar 'dir de bzhin gshegs pas chos ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin du 'khor 'di dang 'dra bar ni chos bstan par bgyi'o/ /zhes smon lam
272b4('bum): btab bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu de dag gi bsam pa thugs su chud de chos thams cad la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang /
272b5('bum): 'byung ba med pa la bzod par gyur pa mkhyen nas zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga
272b6('bum): sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar bas btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
272b7('bum): ni rgyu dang rkyen ma mchis par bzhad pa mi mdzad na/ ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo/ 'khor 'di'i nang nas srog chags bye
273a1('bum): ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /de dag gis ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad na bskal
273a2('bum): p a me tog gi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub kyi yan lag me tog ces bya ba sha stag 'jig rten du
273a3('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ shA ri'i bu'i le'u ste/ gnyis pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag
273a4('bum): brgya pa| bam po bcu gsum pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
273a5('bum): la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las brtsams te/ ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
273a6('bum): chos kyi gtam bya bar spobs pa skyed cig / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam ste/ tshe dang ldan pa
273a7('bum): rab 'byor 'di rang gi shes rab dang / spobs pa tsam gyi stobs dang / shugs kyi go chas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston tam
273b1('bum): 'on te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus ston par 'gyur snyam pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos
273b2('bum): chen po de dag dang / lha'i bu de dag gis sems kyi kun tu rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bcom ldan
273b3('bum): 'das kyi nyan thos rnams ni/ gang ci smra'ang rung / gang ci ston kyang rung / gang ci rjod kyang rung ste/ de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang
273b4('bum): bstan pa de thams cad kyang chos nyid dang mi 'gal lo/ /de ltar rigs kyi bu de dag ni/ chos bstan pa de la slob cing chos nyid de lta bu mngon du byed do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni/ de bzhin
273b5('bum): gshegs pa nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thabs kyis ston pa mdzad kyi/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems
273b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul ma yin no/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
273b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'am/
274a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di chos gang gi tshig bla dwags lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'am/
274a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba de lta bu bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dang / shes
274a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ming de'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ su zhig/ shes rab kyi pha
274a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa ni/ gang zhig la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
274a5('bum): to| |rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ming du bya ba de dag ni/ ming tsam ste/ ming de ni/ nang na'ang med/
274a6('bum): phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sems can sems can zhes bya bar ming du gdags pa'i ming de ni/ btags
274a7('bum): pa tsam ste/ btags pa'i chos gang yin pa de la ni/ ming dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba'am 'gag pa med de/ ming de ni/ nang na'ang med/ phyi
274b1('bum): rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bdag bdag ces bya bar ming du gdags pa'i ming de ni/ btags pa tsam ste/ btags

281a1('bum): phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ chos kyi khams zhes bya ba 'di ni/ chos su gdags pa tsam du zad de/ chos su btags

281a5('bum): par yang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du gang 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ming zhes bya ba
281a6('bum): dag kyang chos su gdags pa tsam du zad de/ chos su btags pa de la 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems

330a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod
330a2('bum): par bya bar 'dod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi drung du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas
330a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos kyang thos par 'gyur te/ ji skad du thos pa'i chos de dag kyang nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas kyi bar du rgyun
330a4('bum): chad par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang thob par 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyang thob par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
330a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ming dang brdar bya ba'i chos su gdags pa rnams de ltar khong du chud par bya'o/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po
330a6('bum): bcu drug pa/ rab 'byor/ gang yang khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi na zhes smras pa de la/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs
330a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam| gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs ma
330b1('bum): yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/
330b2('bum): gzugs la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub
330b3('bum): sems dpa' la gzugs yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs med pa
330b4('bum): zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba byang chub
330b5('bum): sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba ma yin pa gzhan zhig
330b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba la byang chub sems
330b7('bum): dpa' yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la tshor ba yod snyam
331a1('bum): mam| gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba med pa zhig byang chub sems
331a2('bum): dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ 'du shes byang chub sems dpa' yin

337a5('bum): pa| rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags

337b4('bum): pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/

352b1('bum): mam| gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems
352b2('bum): dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ rnam par shes pa'i de
352b3('bum): bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/
352b4('bum): rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
352b5('bum): pa| rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan
352b6('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags
352b7('bum): so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/
353a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ mig gi de bzhin nyid byang chub

353b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ rna ba'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems

359b4('bum): yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam
359b5('bum): du sems/ sgra'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
359b6('bum): rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la sgra'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
359b7('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ sgra'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags
360a1('bum): so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ rna pa'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa'
360a2('bum): yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ rna ba'i rnam par shes
360a3('bum): pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa'i yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
360a4('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
360a5('bum): de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid
360a6('bum): yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i
360a7('bum): khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
360b1('bum): 'byor| de ji snyam du sems/ sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
360b2('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma

360b6('bum): yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ dri'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang
360b7('bum): chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ dri'i khams
361a1('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das

367a2('bum): mam| gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med
367a3('bum): pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du
367a4('bum): sems| rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
367a5('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de

373b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ rga shi'i de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam
373b2('bum): mam| gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bco brgyad pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
373b3('bum): pa| rab 'byor/ khyod kyis don gyi dbang gang zhig mthong na/ de skad du gzugs kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/
373b4('bum): gzugs la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang gzugs yod pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ tshor
373b5('bum): pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ tshor ba ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ tshor ba la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'
373b6('bum): la'ang tshor ba yod pa ma yin/ tshor ba med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ 'du shes kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ 'du shes ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub

374a1('bum): dpa' ma yin/ 'du byed kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ 'du byed ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ 'du byed la'ang byang chub
374a2('bum): sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang 'du byed yod pa ma yin/ 'du byed med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'ang byang chub sems
374a3('bum): dpa' ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rnam par shes pa la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'
374a4('bum): la'ang rnam par shes pa yod pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ mig kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ mig ma yin pa gzhan yang
374a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ mig la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang mig yod pa ma yin/ mig med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma
374a6('bum): yin/ rna ba'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rna ba ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rna ba la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems
374a7('bum): dpa' la'ang rna ba yod pa ma yin/ rna ba med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sna'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sna ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma
374b1('bum): yin/ sna la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang sna yod pa ma yin/ sna med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lce'ang byang chub sems
374b2('bum): dpa' ma yin/ lce ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lce la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang lce yod pa ma yin/ lce med
374b3('bum): pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lus kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lus ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lus la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa
374b4('bum): ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang lus yod pa ma yin/ lus med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ yid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ yid ma yin pa gzhan
374b5('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ yid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang yid yod pa ma yin/ yid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma
374b6('bum): yin| gzugs kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub
374b7('bum): sems dpa' la'ang gzugs yod pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sgra'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sgra ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems
375a1('bum): dpa' ma yin/ sgra la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang sgra yod pa ma yin/ sgra med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa'
375a2('bum): ma yin/ dri'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ dri ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ dri la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems

375a5('bum): ma yin/ reg ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ reg la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang reg yod pa ma yin/ reg
375a6('bum): med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ chos kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ chos ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ chos la'ang byang chub sems
375a7('bum): dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang chos yod pa ma yin/ chos med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ mig gi khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/

381a1('bum): sems dpa' ma yin/ lce'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lce'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin /
