381a3('bum): ma yin/ lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lus kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lus kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang
381a4('bum): chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang lus kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ lus kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ yid kyi
381a5('bum): de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ yid kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ yid kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod
381a6('bum): pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang yid kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ yid kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang
381a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa
381b1('bum): ma yin| byang chub sems dpa' la'ang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sgra'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems
381b2('bum): dpa' ma yin/ sgra'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sgra'i de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang sgra'i
381b3('bum): de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ sgra'i de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ dri'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ dri'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang
381b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ dri'i de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang dri'i de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ dri'i de bzhin nyid med
381b5('bum): pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ ro'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ ro'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ ro'i de bzhin nyid
381b6('bum): la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang ro'i de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ ro'i de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ reg gi de
381b7('bum): bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ reg gi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ reg gi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma
382a1('bum): yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang reg gi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ reg gi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ chos kyi de
382a2('bum): bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa'
382a3('bum): yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang chos kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ mig gi khams kyi de bzhin
382a4('bum): nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ mig gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ mig gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub
382a5('bum): sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang mig gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ mig gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma
382a6('bum): yin/ gzugs kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs
382a7('bum): kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang gzugs kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams kyi de
382b1('bum): bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin
382b2('bum): nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang
382b3('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rna ba'i khams kyi de bzhin
382b4('bum): nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rna ba'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rna ba'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa'
382b5('bum): yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang rna ba'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ rna ba'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sgra'i khams
382b6('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sgra'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sgra'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems
382b7('bum): dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang sgra'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ sgra'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam
383a1('bum): par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub
383a2('bum): sems dpa' ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i
383a3('bum): khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems
383a4('bum): dpa' ma yin/ sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang
383a5('bum): chub sems dpa' la'ang sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ dri'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub
383a6('bum): sems dpa' ma yin/ dri'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ dri'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma
383a7('bum): yin| byang chub sems dpa' la'ang dri'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ dri'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sna'i rnam par shes
383b1('bum): pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sna'i rnam par
383b2('bum): shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ sna'i
383b3('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid
383b4('bum): ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang lce'i khams kyi de
383b5('bum): bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ ro'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ ro'i khams kyi de
383b6('bum): bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ ro'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang ro'i khams
383b7('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ ro'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma
384a1('bum): yin| lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin
384a2('bum): nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams
384a3('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lus kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lus kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang
384a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lus kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang lus kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma
384a5('bum): yin| lus kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ reg bya'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ reg bya'i khams kyi de bzhin
384a6('bum): nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ reg bya'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang reg bya'i
384a7('bum): khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ reg bya'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems
384b1('bum): dpa' ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang
384b2('bum): chub sems dpa' yod ba ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin
384b3('bum): nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ yid kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ yid kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems
384b4('bum): dpa' ma yin/ yid kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang yid kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ yid kyi khams
384b5('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ chos kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ chos kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang
384b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ chos kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang chos kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma
384b7('bum): yin/ chos kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ yid kyi rnam
385a1('bum): par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang
385a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi
385a3('bum): de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub
385a4('bum): sems dpa' ma yin/ sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ sa'i khams
385a5('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub
385a6('bum): sems dpa' ma yin/ chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ chu'i
385a7('bum): khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan
385b1('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma
385b2('bum): yin| me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa
385b3('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma
385b4('bum): yin| rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma
385b5('bum): yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang nam mkha'i khams
385b6('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma
385b7('bum): yin| rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod
386a1('bum): pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med
386a2('bum): pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ ma rig
386a3('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems
386a4('bum): dpa' ma yin/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid
386a5('bum): la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/
386a6('bum): rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i de
386a7('bum): bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid med pa'ang
386b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ ming
386b2('bum): dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid
386b3('bum): med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma
386b4('bum): yin| skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid
386b5('bum): med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ reg pa'i de
386b6('bum): bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang reg pa'i de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ reg pa'i de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/
386b7('bum): tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa'
387a1('bum): yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sred
387a2('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sred pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sred pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod
387a3('bum): pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang sred pa'i de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ sred pa'i de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ len pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub
387a4('bum): sems dpa' ma yin/ len pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ len pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub
387a5('bum): sems dpa' la'ang len pa'i de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ len pa'i de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ srid pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/
387a6('bum): srid pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ srid pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang srid pa'i
387a7('bum): de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ srid pa'i de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ skye ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ skye ba'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa
387b1('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ skye ba'i de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang skye ba'i de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ skye ba'i de bzhin
387b2('bum): nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rga shi'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rga shi'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rga shi'i
387b3('bum): de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la'ang rga shi'i de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ rga shi'i de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin
387b4('bum): no zhes zer/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la gzugs kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta
387b5('bum): ga la mchis/ gzugs ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ gzugs la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'
387b6('bum): la gzugs mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ gzugs ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis
387b7('bum): shing mi dmigs na/ de la tshor ba'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ tshor ba ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis /
388a1('bum): tshor ba la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la tshor ba mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ tshor ba ma mchis pa byang
388a2('bum): chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la 'du shes kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems
388a3('bum): dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ 'du shes ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ 'du shes la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/
388a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' la 'du shes mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ 'du shes ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems
388a5('bum): dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la 'du byed kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ 'du byed ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur
388a6('bum): ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ 'du byed la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'du byed mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ 'du byed ma mchis pa
388a7('bum): byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la rnam par shes pa'i tshig bla dwags byang
388b1('bum): chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rnam par shes pa ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ rnam par shes pa la byang chub sems dpa' mchis
388b2('bum): par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par shes pa mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ rnam par shes pa ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis /
388b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la mig gi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ mig ma lags pa gzhan
388b4('bum): byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ mig la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la mig mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ mig ma

396a2('bum): pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la rnam par shes pa'i tshig bla dwags

396a4('bum): dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par shes pa mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ rnam par shes pa ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur
396a5('bum): ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la ming dang gzugs kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar
396a6('bum): 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ ming dang gzugs ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ ming dang gzugs la byang chub sems dpa' mchis
396a7('bum): par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la ming dang gzugs mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ ming dang gzugs ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga
396b1('bum): la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la skye mched drug gi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/
396b2('bum): skye mched drug ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ skye mched drug la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'
396b3('bum): la skye mched drug mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ skye mched drug ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' shin
396b4('bum): tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la reg pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ reg pa ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang
396b5('bum): ga la mchis/ reg pa la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la reg pa mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ reg pa ma mchis pa byang chub sems
396b6('bum): dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la tshor ba'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga
396b7('bum): la mchis/ tshor ba ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ tshor ba la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'
397a1('bum): la tshor ba mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ tshor ba ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems
397a2('bum): dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la sred pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ sred pa ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar

397a4('bum): pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la len pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub
397a5('bum): sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ len pa ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ len pa la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang
397a6('bum): ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la len pa mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ len pa ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/

397b1('bum): chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ srid pa la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la srid pa mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/

397b3('bum): dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ skye ba ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ skye ba la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par

397b5('bum): chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la rga shi'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rga shi ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems

397b7('bum): pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla
398a1('bum): dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la

402b7('bum): shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing
403a1('bum): mi dmigs na/ de la sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems par 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags
403a2('bum): pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'
403a3('bum): la sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan
403a4('bum): 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la dri'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshigs bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/
403a5('bum): dri'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ dri'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par
403a6('bum): yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la dri'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ dri'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis ba byang chub sems dpar
403a7('bum): 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi
403b1('bum): tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis
403b2('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid
403b3('bum): mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub
403b4('bum): sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ lce'i khams kyi de
403b5('bum): bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/
403b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' la lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga
403b7('bum): la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la ro'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar
404a1('bum): 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ ro'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ ro'i khams kyi de bzhin
404a2('bum): nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la ro'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ ro'i khams kyi de bzhin
404a3('bum): nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la lce'i rnam par
404a4('bum): shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan
404a5('bum): byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub
404a6('bum): sems dpa' la lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems
404a7('bum): dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la lus kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dwags
404b1('bum): byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ lus kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ lus kyi khams
404b2('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la lus kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ lus kyi khams
404b3('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpa' 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la reg
404b4('bum): bya'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ reg bya'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar
404b5('bum): 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ reg bya'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpar mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la reg bya'i khams kyi de bzhin
404b6('bum): nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ reg bya'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems
404b7('bum): dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ lus
405a1('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ lus kyi rnam par shes
405a2('bum): pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis
405a3('bum): par yang ga la 'gyur/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang
405a4('bum): chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la yid kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ yid kyi
405a5('bum): khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ yid kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang
405a6('bum): ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la yid kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ yid kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar
405a7('bum): 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la chos kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dwags byang
405b1('bum): chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ chos kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ chos kyi khams kyi de bzhin
405b2('bum): nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la chos kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ chos kyi khams kyi de
405b3('bum): bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la yid kyi
405b4('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa
405b5('bum): gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang
405b6('bum): chub sems dpa' la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub
405b7('bum): sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla
406a1('bum): dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la
406a2('bum): mchis| sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la
406a3('bum): 'gyur| sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis
406a4('bum): shing mi dmigs na/ de la chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa
406a5('bum): gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems
406a6('bum): dpa' la chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom
406a7('bum): ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/
406b1('bum): me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la
406b2('bum): 'gyur| byang chub sems dpa' la me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga
406b3('bum): la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur
406b4('bum): ba lta ga la mchis/ rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems
406b5('bum): dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang
406b6('bum): chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid
406b7('bum): kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/
407a1('bum): nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid
407a2('bum): mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems

407a5('bum): mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin
407a6('bum): nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la ma rig pa'i de
407a7('bum): bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/
407b1('bum): ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ ma rig pa'i de

407b5('bum): de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la rnam
407b6('bum): par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur
407b7('bum): ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid
408a1('bum): mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan
408a2('bum): 'das| byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la
408a3('bum): mchis| ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur pa lta'ang ga la mchis/ ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid la byang
408a4('bum): chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ ming dang gzugs kyi
408a5('bum): de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la skye
408a6('bum): mched drug gi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar
408a7('bum): 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la skye mched drug gi de bzhin
408b1('bum): nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'
408b2('bum): shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan

408b5('bum): ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub
408b6('bum): sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid mchis
408b7('bum): par yang ga la 'gyur/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur pa lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis
409a1('bum): shing mi dmigs na/ de la sred pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ sred pa'i de bzhin nyid ma lags pa

409a3('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ sred pa'i de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems par 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems
409a4('bum): dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la len pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ len pa'i de bzhin nyid ma lags
409a5('bum): pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ len pa'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la len
409a6('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ len pa'i de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub
409a7('bum): sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la srid pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ sred pa'i de bzhin
409b1('bum): nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ sred pa'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'
409b2('bum): la srid pa'i de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ srid pa'i de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub
409b3('bum): sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la skye ba'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ skye ba'i de bzhin nyid ma lags
409b4('bum): pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ skye ba'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la skye ba'i
409b5('bum): de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ skye ba'i de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems
409b6('bum): dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la rga shi'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rga shi'i de bzhin nyid ma lags pa
409b7('bum): gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ rga shi'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la rga
410a1('bum): shi'i de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ rga shi'i de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis te/ de ni/ gnas
410a2('bum): ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ legs so/ /legs so/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can mi dmigs
410a3('bum): pas| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa la de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gang yang 'di skad du 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de chos
410a4('bum): gang gi tshig bla dwags yin zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di gzugs kyi tshig bla dwags yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/
410a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di tshor ba'i tshig
410a6('bum): bla dwags yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub
410a7('bum): sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di 'du shes kyi tshig bla dwags yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
410b1('bum): rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di 'du byed kyi tshig bla dwags yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom
410b2('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di rnam par shes pa'i tshig bla dwags yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/
410b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di gzugs rtag pa'i
410b4('bum): tshig bla dwags yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems
410b5('bum): dpa' zhes bya ba 'di gzugs mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
410b6('bum): de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di tshor brtag pa'i tshig bla dwags yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
410b7('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di tshor ba mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta
411a1('bum): ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di 'du shes rtag pa'i tshig bla
411a2('bum): dwags yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa'
411a3('bum): zhes bya ba 'di 'du shes mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
411a4('bum): de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di 'du byed rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan
411a5('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di 'du byed mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
411a6('bum): 'das| de lta ma lags so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di rnam par shes pa rtag pa'i tshig
411a7('bum): bla dwags yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems
411b1('bum): dpa' zhes bya ba 'di rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
411b2('bum): de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di gzugs bde ba'i tshig bla dwags yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
411b3('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di gzugs sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dwags yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
411b4('bum): de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di tshor ba bde ba'i tshig bla dwags yin snyam mam/
411b5('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di tshor ba sdug
411b6('bum): bsngal ba'i tshig bla dwags yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub
411b7('bum): sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di 'du shes bde ba'i tshig bla dwags yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
412a1('bum): 'byor| de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di 'du shes sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dwags yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de
412a2('bum): lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di 'du byed bde ba'i tshig bla dwags yin snyam mam/

416a1('bum): tshig bla dwags yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam

416b1('bum): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di 'du shes smon pa
416b2('bum): yod pa'i tshig bla dwags yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub
416b3('bum): sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di 'du shes smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dwags yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

416b6('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di rnam par
416b7('bum): shes pa smon pa yod pa'i tshig bla dwags yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam
417a1('bum): du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dwags yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta
417a2('bum): ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ khyod kyis don gyi dbang 'di nye bar bzung nas 'di skad du/ gzugs kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' ma
417a3('bum): yin zhes zer/ tshor ba'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' ma yin zhes zer/ 'du shes kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' ma yin zhes zer/ 'du byed kyi tshig bla dwags
417a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' ma yin zhes zer/ rnam par shes pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' ma yin zhes zer/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de gzugs rtag pa'i tshig
417a5('bum): bla dwags ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de gzugs mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de gzugs bde ba'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ byang
417a6('bum): chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de gzugs sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de gzugs bdag yod pa'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ byang
417a7('bum): chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de gzugs bdag med pa'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de gzugs zhi ba'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ byang chub sems
417b1('bum): dpa' zhes bya ba de gzugs ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de gzugs stong pa'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de
417b2('bum): gzugs mi stong ba'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de gzugs mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de gzugs
417b3('bum): mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de gzugs smon pa yod pa'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de gzugs smon
417b4('bum): pa med pa'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de tshor ba rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de tshor ba mi rtag pa'i tshig bla
417b5('bum): dwags ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de tshor ba bde ba'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de tshor ba sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ byang
417b6('bum): chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de tshor ba bdag yod pa'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de tshor ba bdag med pa'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ byang chub sems
417b7('bum): dpa' zhes bya ba de tshor ba zhi ba'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de tshor ba ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de tshor ba
418a1('bum): stong pa'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de tshor ba mi stong pa'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de
418a2('bum): tshor ba mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de tshor ba mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba
418a3('bum): de tshor ba smon pa yod pa'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de tshor ba smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de

418a6('bum): yod pa'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de 'du shes bdag med pa'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de 'du shes zhi ba'i
418a7('bum): tshig bla dwags ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de 'du shes ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de 'du shes stong pa'i tshig bla

425a2('bum): tshig bla dwags mi dmigs pa dang / 'du byed mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par shes pa rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par shes

425a4('bum): tshor ba bde ba'i tshig bla dwags mi dmigs pa dang / tshor ba sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dwags mi dmigs pa dang / 'du shes bde ba'i tshig bla dwags mi dmigs pa dang /

438a1('bum): pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba la bslab par bgyi'o/ /'phags

438b1('bum): pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/ /snying rje chen po yongs su

438b3('bum): yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan
438b4('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas te/ bsam gtan dang po las langs nas 'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang / 'gog pa las langs nas bsam gtan gnyis pa la mnyam
438b5('bum): par bzhag pa dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa las langs nas 'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang / 'gog pa las langs nas bsam gtan gsum pa la mnyam par bzhag
438b6('bum): pa dang / bsam gtan gsum pa las langs nas 'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang / 'gog pa las langs nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la mnyam par bzhag pa
438b7('bum): dang | bsam gtan bzhi pa las langs nas 'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang / 'gog pa las langs nas byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /
439a1('bum): byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin las langs nas 'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang / 'gog pa las langs nas snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag
439a2('bum): pa dang / snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin las langs nas 'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang / 'gog pa las langs nas dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /
439a3('bum): dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin las langs nas 'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang / 'gog pa las langs nas btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /
439a4('bum): btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin las langs nas 'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang / 'gog pa las langs nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la mnyam par bzhag pa
439a5('bum): dang | nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas 'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang / 'gog pa las langs nas cung zad med pa'i skye mched la mnyam par bzhag
439a6('bum): pa dang / cung zad med pa'i skyed mched las langs nas 'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang / 'gog pa las langs nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la mnyam par bzhag
439a7('bum): pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas 'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang / 'gog pa las langs nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched
439b1('bum): la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las langs nas 'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
439b2('bum): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/ /seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems
439b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/ /seng+ge rnam par rtse ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems
439b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo dang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad thob par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems
439b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/ /dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
439b6('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/ /rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
439b7('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/ /zla ba'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
440a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/ /zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems
440a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/ /chos thams cad phyag rgyar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang
440a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/ /spyan ras gzigs kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal

440a5('bum): 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/ /nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par

440b7('bum): c ad shes par gnas pa la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab

441b6('bum): par bgyi'o/ /ye shes sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par

442a1('bum): pa la bslab par bgyi'o/ /nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa'i rnam par grol bas gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal

442a3('bum): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang sems can thams cad kyi bsam
442a4('bum): pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/
442a5('bum): gzhan yang dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yongs su rdzogs pas/ ngan song rnams su mi ltung zhing rigs dma' bar mi skye ba dang / nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la mi
442a6('bum): gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon chen por mi ltung ba de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
442a7('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang
442b1('bum): ldan pa rab 'byor/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon chen por ltung ba yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA
442b2('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mi mkhas pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing / thabs
442b3('bum): mi mkhas pas stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la brten te nyan thos kyi sar yang mi ltung / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung la/ byang chub
442b4('bum): sems dpa'i skyon med par yang mi 'jug pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir na/ de byang chub sems
442b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon du 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/
442b6('bum): chos la sred pa'o/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ chos la sred pa gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
442b7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs stong zhes bya bar mngon par chags shing gnas te 'du shes pa dang / tshor ba stong zhes bya bar mngon par chags
443a1('bum): shing gnas te 'du shes pa dang / 'du shes stong zhes bya bar mngon par chags shing gnas te 'du shes pa dang / 'du byed stong zhes bya bar mngon par

444a6('bum): te 'du shes ba dang / 'du shes stong zhes bya bar mngon par chags shing gnas te 'du shes pa dang / 'du byed stong zhes bya bar mngon par chags shing gnas te 'du shes pa dang / rnam par

444b6('bum): smon pa med ces bya bar mngon par chags shing gnas te 'du shes pa dang / 'du shes smon pa med ces bya bar mngon bar chags shing gnas te 'du shes pa dang / 'du byed smon pa med ces bya
444b7('bum): bar mngon par chags shing gnas te 'du shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar mngon par chags shing gnas te 'du shes pa 'di ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub
445a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthun pa'i chos la sred pa ste/ skyon du 'gyur ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems

445a3('bum): spang bar bya'o/ /'du shes 'di spang bar bya'o/ /'dis 'du shes spang bar bya'o/ /'du byed 'di spang bar bya'o/ /'dis 'du byed spang bar bya'o/ /rnam par shes pa 'di spang bar bya'o/ /'dis rnam
445a4('bum): par shes pa spang bar bya'o/ /sdug bsngal 'di yongs su shes par bya'o/ /'dis sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya'o/ /kun 'byung ba 'di spang bar bya'o/ /'dis kun 'byung ba spang bar bya'o//
445a5('bum): 'gog pa 'di mngon du bya'o/ /'dis 'gog pa mngon du bya'o/ /lam 'di bsgom par bya'o/ /'dis lam bsgom par bya'o/ /'di ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'o/ /'di ni/ rnam par byang ba'o/ /
445a6('bum): chos 'di dag ni/ bsten par bya'o/ /chos 'di dag ni/ bsten par mi bya'o/ /'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos spyad par bya'o/ /'di la spyad par mi bya'o/ /'di ni/ byang
445a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ /'di ni/ lam ma yin no/ /'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa'o/ /'di ni/ bslab pa ma yin no/ /'di ni/
445b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /'di ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims
445b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /'di ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /'di ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol
445b3('bum): tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /'di ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /'di ni/ byang chub sems
445b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi
445b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /'di ni/ thabs mkhas pa ma yin no/ /
445b6('bum): 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa'o/ /'di ni/ skyon du 'gyur ba'o/ /zhes bya bar chos de dag la mngon par chags shing gnas te 'du shes pa 'di ni/ byang
445b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthun pa'i chos la sred pa ste/ skyon du 'gyur ba'o/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon
446a1('bum): med pa gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
446a2('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe nang stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / phyi stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / phyi stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid yang dag par
446a3('bum): rjes su mi mthong / phyi nang stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / phyi nang stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la phyi
446a4('bum): nang stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / chen po stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par
446a5('bum): rjes su mi mthong / chen po stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / don dam pa stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / don dam pa stong pa nyid la
446a6('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
446a7('bum): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yang
446b1('bum): dag par rjes su mi mthong / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
446b2('bum): nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / thog ma dang tham med pa stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la dor ba med pa stong
446b3('bum): pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma med ba stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / dor pa med pa stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid yang dag
446b4('bum): par rjes su mi mthong / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
446b5('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / rang gi mtshan nyid
446b6('bum): stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la
446b7('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mi dmigs
447a1('bum): pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / ngo bo nyid stong pa
447a2('bum): nyid la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / dngos po med
447a3('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes
447a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
447a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ slob pa'i tshe ci nas kyang gzugs shes par bya ste/ gzugs des rlom sems su mi bya'o/ /tshor ba
447a6('bum): shes par bya ste/ tshor ba des rlom sems su mi bya'o/ /'du shes shes par bya ste/ 'du shes des rlom sems su mi bya'o/ /'du byed shes par bya ste/ 'du byed des rlom sems
447a7('bum): su mi bya'o/ /rnam par shes pa shes par bya ste/ rnam par shes pa des rlom sems su mi bya'o/ /mig shes par bya ste/ mig des rlom sems su mi bya'o/ /rna ba shes par bya
447b1('bum): ste| rna ba des rlom sems su mi bya'o/ /sna shes par bya ste/ sna des rlom sems su mi bya'o/ /lce shes par bya ste/ lce des rlom sems su mi bya'o/ /lus shes par bya ste/ lus des rlom
447b2('bum): sems su mi bya'o/ /yid shes par bya ste/ yid des rlom sems su mi bya'o/ /gzugs shes par bya ste/ gzugs des rlom sems su mi bya'o/ /sgra shes par bya ste/ sgra des rlom sems

448a1('bum): rlom sems su mi bya'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa shes par bya ste/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa des rlom sems su mi bya'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa shes par bya

460a1('bum): kyi mchog tu bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te/ bstan pa 'di'ang de'i tshul dang 'dra'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos

460a6('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid nan tan du mnyan par bya'o/ /gzung bar bya'o/ /bcang bar bya'o/ /bklag par bya'o/ /yongs su chub par bya'o/ /tshul
460a7('bum): bzhin du yid la bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi sa la slob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid nan tan du mnyan par bya'o/ /gzung bar bya'o/ /
460b1('bum): bcang bar bya'o/ /bklag par bya'o/ /yongs su chub par bya'o/ /tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
460b2('bum): rnams dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bslab par bya ba'i theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bzhi pa'o// //shes rab
460b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyi shu gcig pa/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' dang /
460b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma dmigs ma 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma dmigs ma 'tshal na/ byang chub sems
460b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis dngos po ma dmigs ma 'tshal yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/
460b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis dngos po ma dmigs ma 'tshal yang dag pa rjes su ma mthong bzhin du/ chos gang gis chos gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ de
460b7('bum): ltar bdag gis chos thams cad la 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs ma 'tshal bar 'di lta ste/ ming tsam du byang chub sems dpa' zhe'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes
461a1('bum): bgyi bar 'phel ba dang / 'grib par bgyis na/ de nyid bdag gi 'gyod par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/
461a2('bum): byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na/ ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ bcom

467b1('bum): ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/
467b2('bum): yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bdag gis mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/
467b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs
467b4('bum): pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhen/ ming de ma mchis pas de ltar na/ ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis rna pa'i
467b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bdag gis rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'phel
467b6('bum): ba dang / 'grib ba ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ming de
467b7('bum): de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas de ltar na/ ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis
468a1('bum): brlabs pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong
468a2('bum): ste| bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bdag gis sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la

468a4('bum): na| ming de ma mchis pas de ltar na/ ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i
468a5('bum): 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bdag gis lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/
468a6('bum): yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/
468a7('bum): thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas de ltar na/ ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so//
468b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bdag
468b2('bum): gis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags
468b3('bum): par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i
468b4('bum): slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas de ltar na/ ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis yid kyi 'dus
468b5('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bdag gis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor

482a4('bum): ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes
482a5('bum): su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bdag gis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming
482a6('bum): du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming
482a7('bum): de ma mchis pas de ltar na/ ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'phel
482b1('bum): ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bdag gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs yang
482b2('bum): dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin
482b3('bum): gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas de ltar na/ ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/
482b4('bum): bdag gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bdag gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi
482b5('bum): 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ming

483a5('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/

489b4('bum): rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bdag gis chos rjes su dran pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa'
489b5('bum): zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos rjes su dran pa'i ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad
489b6('bum): du zhe na| ming de ma mchis pas de ltar na/ ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis dge 'dun rjes su dran
489b7('bum): pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bdag gis dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma

497a4('bum): 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ zhi ba'i ming de'ang gnas pa
497a5('bum): ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas de ltar na/ ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma
497a6('bum): mchis| byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis skye ba ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong
497a7('bum): ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bdag gis skye ba ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes
497b1('bum): gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ skye ba ma mchis pa'i ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad
497b2('bum): du zhe na| ming de ma mchis pas de ltar na/ ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis 'gag pa ma
497b3('bum): mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bdag gis 'gag pa ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib
497b4('bum): pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'gag pa ma mchis pa'i ming de'ang
497b5('bum): gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas de ltar na/ ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma
497b6('bum): mchis| byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis 'byung ba ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong
497b7('bum): ste| bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bdag gis 'byung ba ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang
498a1('bum): la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'byung ba ma mchis pa'i ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis
498a2('bum): brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas de ltar na/ ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so/ /
498a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de
498a4('bum): ltar bdag gis mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du
498a5('bum): gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i
498a6('bum): slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas de ltar na/ ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis
498a7('bum): kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bdag gis kun nas nyon mongs
498b1('bum): pa ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ kun
498b2('bum): nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas de ltar na/
498b3('bum): ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/
498b4('bum): yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bdag gis rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/
498b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis
498b6('bum): brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas de ltar na/ ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so/ /bcom
498b7('bum): ldan 'das/ bdag gis chos kyi dbyings kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bdag gis chos kyi dbyings
499a1('bum): kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/
499a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas de
499a3('bum): ltar na| ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis de bzhin nyid kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma
