499a6('bum): gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas de ltar na/ ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis
499a7('bum): so| |bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis yang dag pa'i mtha'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar
499b1('bum): bdag gis yang dag pa'i mtha'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom
499b2('bum): ldan 'das/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas de ltar na/
499b3('bum): ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis chos kyi gnas nyid kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/
499b4('bum): yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bdag gis chos kyi gnas nyid kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/
499b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi gnas nyid kyi ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs
499b6('bum): pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas de ltar na/ ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan
499b7('bum): 'das| bdag gis chos skyon med pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bdag gis chos skyon med pa'i 'phel
500a1('bum): ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan
500a2('bum): 'das| chos skyon med pa'i ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas de ltar na/ ming
500a3('bum): de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma
500a4('bum): dmigs| yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bdag gis dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag
500a5('bum): par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos kyi ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/
500a6('bum): thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas de ltar na/ ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs
500a7('bum): pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma
500b1('bum): mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bdag gis 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang
500b2('bum): chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis /
500b3('bum): byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas de ltar na/ ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so/ /bcom
500b4('bum): ldan 'das/ bdag gis 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bdag gis
500b5('bum): 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom
500b6('bum): ldan 'das/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas
500b7('bum): de ltar na/ ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos
501a1('bum): rnams kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bdag gis zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag
501a2('bum): pa ma mchis pa'i chos rnams kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan
501a3('bum): 'das| zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos rnams kyi ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming
501a4('bum): de ma mchis pas de ltar na/ ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da
501a5('bum): ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bdag gis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da
501a6('bum): ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan
501a7('bum): 'das| 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/
501b1('bum): ming de ma mchis pas de ltar na/ ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis 'das pa ma mchis pa dang / ma 'ongs
501b2('bum): pa ma mchis pa dang / da ltar byung ba ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bdag gis 'das pa ma mchis pa
501b3('bum): dang / ma 'ongs pa ma mchis pa dang / da ltar byung ba ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags
501b4('bum): bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'das pa ma mchis pa dang / ma 'ongs pa ma mchis pa dang / de ltar byung ba ma mchis pa'i ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs
501b5('bum): pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas de ltar na/ ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so/ /de la ci zhes bgyi zhe na/ de
501b6('bum): ni 'dus ma bgyis te/ 'dus ma bgyis ni/ 'das pa ma lags so/ /ma 'ongs pa ma lags so/ /da ltar byung ba ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis 'dus ma bgyis kyi 'phel ba
501b7('bum): dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ 'dus ma bgyis pa'o/ /de'ang gang zhe na/ gang la skye ba ma mchis/ gnas pa ma mchis/ 'jig pa ma mchis te/
502a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib ba'ang ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /bcom
502a2('bum): ldan 'das/ bdag gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos
502a3('bum): kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis lho
502a4('bum): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang
502a5('bum): chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
502a6('bum): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang
502a7('bum): bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
502b1('bum): kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag
502b2('bum): par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
502b3('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /bcom
502b4('bum): ldan 'das/ bdag gis shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
502b5('bum): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/
502b6('bum): bdag gis lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos
502b7('bum): kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis nub byang gi
503a1('bum): p hyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi
503a2('bum): dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis 'og gi
503a3('bum): p hyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa byang chub sems
503a4('bum): dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
503a5('bum): snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma
503a6('bum): dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
503a7('bum): dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa rnams kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol
503b1('bum): tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gang zhig brtags par bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan de'ang
503b2('bum): gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis/ dge 'dun gyi ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis/ byang chub sems
503b3('bum): dpa'i ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas de ltar na/ ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug ba ma mchis/
503b4('bum): byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan
503b5('bum): 'das| de ltar bdag gis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par
503b6('bum): bgyi| bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis
503b7('bum): pas de ltar na/ ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyi shu rtsa gsum
504a1('bum): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ gang yang 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes chos kyi brdar bgyi ba dang / chos su gdags pa de'ang gzugs sam/ tshor
504a2('bum): ba'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa'am/ mig gam/ rna ba'am/ sna'am/ lce'am/ lus sam/ yid dam/ gzugs sam/ sgra'am/ dri 'am/ ro'am/ reg gam/
504a3('bum): chos sam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'am/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'am/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'am/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'am/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'am/ yid kyi rnam par shes
504a4('bum): pa'am/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'am/ mig
504a5('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am/ lus
504a6('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am/ sa'i khams sam/ chu'i khams sam/ me'i khams sam/ rlung gi khams sam/ nam
504a7('bum): mkha'i khams sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams sam/ ma rig pa'am/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ ming dang gzugs sam/ skye mched drug gam/ reg pa'am/ tshor ba'am/
504b1('bum): srid pa'am/ len pa'am/ srid pa'am/ skye ba'am/ rga shi'am/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ brtson 'grus
504b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid
504b3('bum): stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang
504b4('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid
504b5('bum): dam| dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu
504b6('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
504b7('bum): sam| bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
505a1('bum): ba rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams
505a2('bum): sam| gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po'am/ snying rje
505a3('bum): chen po'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ chos su gdags pa tsam du bas so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rmi lam zhes bgyi ba'i ming
505a4('bum): ni| gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so/ /sgyu ma zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni/ gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so/ /sgra brnyan zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni/ gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so/ /mig yor
505a5('bum): zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni/ gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so/ /smig rgyu zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni/ gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so/ /chu zla zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni/ gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis

505a7('bum): kyang brjod du ma mchis so/ /sa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni/ gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so/ /chu zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni/ gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so/ /me zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni/ gang
505b1('bum): gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so/ /rlung zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni/ gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so/ /de bzhin nyid ces bgyi ba'i ming ni/ gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so/ /ma nor ba de bzhin
505b2('bum): nyid ces bgyi ba'i ming ni/ gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so/ /gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid ces bgyi ba'i ming ni/ gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so/ /chos nyid ces bgyi ba'i ming

505b4('bum): mchis so/ /chos skyon med pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i ming ni/ gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni/ gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
505b5('bum): phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni/ gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni/ gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes
505b6('bum): bgyi ba'i ming ni/ gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming na/ gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes

506b3('bum): ba'am| bdag gam/ bdag ma mchis pa'am/ zhi ba'am/ ma zhi ba'am/ dben pa'am/ mi dben pa'am/ dngos po'am/ dngos po ma mchis pa gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis pas/

511a7('bum): bas stong ste/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba

511b2('bum): gyis tshor ba lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags/

512a1('bum): na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//
512a2('bum): sa'i khams sa'i khams kyis stong ste/ sa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang sa'i khams ma lags/ sa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sa'i khams nyid kyang
512a3('bum): stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so/ /chu'i khams chu'i khams kyis stong ste/ chu'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang chu'i khams ma lags/ chu'i khams las gud na'ang
512a4('bum): stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ chu'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so/ /me'i khams me'i khams kyis stong ste/ me'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang
512a5('bum): me'i khams ma lags/ me'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ me'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang me'i khams so/ /rlung gi khams rlung gi khams kyis

512b4('bum): de'ang ma rig pa ma lags/ ma rig pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ ma rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o/ /'du byed 'du byed kyis stong ste/ 'du byed kyi

512b7('bum): stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /ming dang gzugs ming dang gzugs kyis stong ste/ ming dang gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang ming dang gzugs ma lags/

517b7('bum): tshad med pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang tshad med pa rnams ma lags/ tshad med pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshad med pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
518a1('bum): kyang tshad med pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshad
518a2('bum): med pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms
518a3('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
518a4('bum): rnams kyis stong ste/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma lags/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms
518a5('bum): par 'jug pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
518a6('bum): so| |bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la
518a7('bum): gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas par mi
518b1('bum): bgyi ste| de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar rnam par thar pa rnams rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong ste/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rnam par thar pa
518b2('bum): rnams ma lags/ rnam par thar pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs
518b3('bum): des na| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par thar pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub
518b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/
518b5('bum): de ni| 'di ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi stong pa
518b6('bum): nyid gang lags pa de'ang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma lags/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ mthar gyis
518b7('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
519a1('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/
519a2('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas par mi
519a3('bum): bgyi ste| de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
519a4('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas stong ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
519a5('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma lags/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par thar pa'i
519a6('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o/ /bcom ldan
519a7('bum): 'das| rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par thar pa'i sto stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
519b1('bum): pa med pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
519b2('bum): la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ de bzhin gshegs
519b3('bum): pa'i stobs rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ de
519b4('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
519b5('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
519b6('bum): pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mi 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar mi 'jigs pa rnams mi 'jigs pa rnams
519b7('bum): kyis stong ste/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang mi 'jigs pa rnams ma lags/ mi 'jigs pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ mi 'jigs pa rnams
520a1('bum): kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
520a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mi 'jigs pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol
520a3('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so so yang dag
520a4('bum): par rig pa rnams kyis stong ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma lags/ so so yang dag rig pa rnams las gud
520a5('bum): na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub
520a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
520a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/
520b1('bum): 'di ltar byams pa chen po byams pa chen pos stong / snying rje chen po snying rje chen pos stong ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ byams pa chen po'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa dang / snying rje chen po'i stong pa
520b2('bum): nyid gang lags pa de'ang byams pa chen po ma lags/ de'ang snying rje chen po ma lags/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ byams pa chen po dang /
520b3('bum): snying rje chen po'ang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi
520b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi
520b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
520b6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
520b7('bum): ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan
521a1('bum): 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
521a2('bum): rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe yi ge rnams la gnas par mi
521a3('bum): bgyi ste| yi ge mngon par sgrub pa la gnas par mi bgyi/ gcig tu brjod pa la gnas par mi bgyi/ gnyis su brjod pa la gnas par mi bgyi/ tha dad du brjod pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /
521a4('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar yi ge rnams yi ge rnams kyis stong ste/ yi ge rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang yi ge rnams ma lags/ yi ge rnams
521a5('bum): las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ yi ge rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang yi ge rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
521a6('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe yi ge rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha
521a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes
521b1('bum): pa rnams kyis stong ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang mngon par shes pa rnams ma lags/ mngon par shes pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/
521b2('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi
521b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
521b4('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste/
521b5('bum): ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams ma lags/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams
521b6('bum): kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
521b7('bum): pa'i tshe ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
522a1('bum): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams
522a2('bum): kyis stong ste/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma lags/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzungs
522a3('bum): kyi sgo rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi
522a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi
522a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzungs mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar gzugs mi rtag pa nyid gzugs mi
522a6('bum): rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs mi rtag pa nyid ma lags/ gzugs mi rtag pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma
522a7('bum): mchis te/ gzugs mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs mi rtag pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
522b1('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe tshor ba mi rtag go zhes
522b2('bum): bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang
522b3('bum): lags pa de'ang tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid ma lags/ tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba mi rtag
522b4('bum): pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe tshor ba mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas
522b5('bum): par mi bgyi'o/ /des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'du shes mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar
522b6('bum): 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid ma lags/ 'du shes mi
522b7('bum): rtag pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs
523a1('bum): des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'du shes mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par
523a2('bum): mi bgyi'o/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa/ des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'du byed mi rtag
523a3('bum): go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed mi rtag
523a4('bum): pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid ma lags/ 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/
523a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'du
523a6('bum): byed mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par shes pa mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du
523a7('bum): zhe na| bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags
523b1('bum): pa de'ang rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa
523b2('bum): nyid kyang rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par
523b3('bum): shes pa mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
523b4('bum): gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis
523b5('bum): stong ste/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/
523b6('bum): gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes
523b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar
524a1('bum): gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor
524a2('bum): ba sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags/ tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba sdug
524a3('bum): bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha
524a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'du shes sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas
524a5('bum): par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi
524a6('bum): stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags/ 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid
524a7('bum): kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha
524b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'du shes sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'du byed sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par
524b2('bum): mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang
524b3('bum): lags pa de'ang 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags/ 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid
524b4('bum): kyang 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'du byed sdug bsngal
524b5('bum): lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
524b6('bum): ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa
524b7('bum): de'ang rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong
525a1('bum): pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
525a2('bum): pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
525a3('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar
525a4('bum): gzugs bdag med pa nyid gzugs bdag med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs bdag med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs bdag med pa nyid ma lags/ gzugs
525a5('bum): bdag med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs bdag med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs bdag med pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam
525a6('bum): grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /des shes rab
525a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe tshor ba bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar tshor ba bdag med pa nyid tshor
525b1('bum): ba bdag med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba bdag med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang tshor ba bdag med pa nyid ma lags/ tshor ba bdag med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma
525b2('bum): mchis te/ tshor ba bdag med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba bdag med pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
525b3('bum): pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe tshor ba bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'du shes bdag med do zhes bgyi
525b4('bum): bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar 'du shes bdag med pa nyid 'du shes bdag med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du shes bdag med pa nyid
525b5('bum): kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang 'du shes bdag med pa nyid ma lags/ 'du shes bdag med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes bdag med pa nyid kyang stong
525b6('bum): pa nyid| stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes bdag med pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
525b7('bum): spyod pa'i tshe 'du shes bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'du byed bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de
526a1('bum): ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar 'du byed bdag med pa nyid 'du byed bdag med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed bdag med pa nyid

526a4('bum): pa'i tshe 'du byed bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par shes pa bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi
526a5('bum): ste| de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa bdag
526a6('bum): med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/
526a7('bum): rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa'
526b1('bum): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par shes pa bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
526b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar
526b3('bum): gzugs zhi ba nyid gzugs zhi ba nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs zhi ba nyid ma lags/ gzugs zhi ba nyid las gud na'ang stong pa
526b4('bum): nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs zhi ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs zhi ba nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos

527a1('bum): des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe tshor bzhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /des shes

531b3('bum): smon pa med pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'du byed smon pa med do zhes bgyi
531b4('bum): bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par shes pa smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/
531b5('bum): de ni| 'di ltar rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rnam par shes
531b6('bum): pa smon pa med pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam
531b7('bum): par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par shes pa
532a1('bum): smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu
532a2('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar gzugs dben pa nyid gzugs dben pa nyid kyis
532a3('bum): stong ste/ gzugs dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs dben pa nyid ma lags/ gzugs dben pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs dben pa
532a4('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs dben pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
532a5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe gzugs dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe tshor ba dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/
532a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar tshor ba dben pa nyid tshor ba dben pa nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang tshor ba dben pa nyid ma lags/ tshor pa
532a7('bum): dben pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba dben pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba dben ba nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub
532b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe tshor ba dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'du shes
532b2('bum): dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar 'du shes dben pa nyid 'du shes dben pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du shes dben pa nyid kyi stong
532b3('bum): pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang 'du shes dben pa nyid ma lags/ 'du shes dben pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes dben pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang
532b4('bum): 'du shes dben pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'du shes dben no zhes bgyi
532b5('bum): bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'du byed dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di
532b6('bum): ltar 'du byed dben pa nyid 'du byed dben pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang 'du byed dben pa nyid ma lags/ 'du byed dben pa nyid las
532b7('bum): gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed dben pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed dben pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
533a1('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'du byed dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
533a2('bum): spyod pa'i tshe rnam par shes pa dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid rnam par shes pa dben
533a3('bum): pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rnam bar shes pa dben pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa
533a4('bum): nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa'
533a5('bum): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par shes pa dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
533a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar de bzhin nyid de
533a7('bum): bzhin nyid kyis stong ste/ de bzhin nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang de bzhin nyid ma lags/ de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ de bzhin nyid kyang stong pa nyid/
533b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe de bzhin nyid la gnas
533b2('bum): par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad
533b3('bum): du zhe na| bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar chos nyid chos nyid kyis stong ste/ chos nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang chos nyid ma lags/ chos nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid
533b4('bum): ma mchis te/ chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang chos nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu
533b5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos kyi
533b6('bum): dbyings la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings chos kyi dbyings kyis stong ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa
533b7('bum): de'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ chos kyi dbyings las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /bcom ldan
534a1('bum): 'das| rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos kyi dbyings la gnas par mi
534a2('bum): bgyi'o| |bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos skyon med pa nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de
534a3('bum): ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar chos skyon med pa nyid chos skyon med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ chos skyon med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang chos skyon med pa
534a4('bum): nyid ma lags/ chos skyon med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ chos skyon med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang chos skyon med pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/
534a5('bum): rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos skyon med pa nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan
534a6('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
534a7('bum): de ni| 'di ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mthas stong ste/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags/ yang dag pa'i mtha'
534b1('bum): las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa'
534b2('bum): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
534b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis gzugs la gnas na/ de gzugs mngon par 'du bgyi ba la
534b4('bum): spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas
534b5('bum): bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis tshor ba la gnas na/ de tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/
534b6('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis 'du
534b7('bum): shes la gnas na/ de 'du shes mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
535a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis 'du byed la gnas na/

535a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis rnam par shes pa la gnas na/ de rnam par shes pa mngon par

537b7('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'

538b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis lce'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas na/ de lce'i 'dus te reg pa mngon
538b3('bum): par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
538b4('bum): pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas na/ de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba
538b5('bum): la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi
538b6('bum): mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas na/ de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/
538b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
539a1('bum): pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
539a2('bum): yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
539a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la
539a4('bum): gnas na/ de mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems
539a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis rna ba'i 'dus te reg
539a6('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas na/ de rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/

539b1('bum): kyis sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas na/ de sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /bcom

542b1('bum): par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

543a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas
543a3('bum): pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas na/ de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du
543a4('bum): bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

543a6('bum): pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
543a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas na/ de brtson
543b1('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
543b2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol
543b3('bum): tu phyin pa la gnas na/ de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal
543b4('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas
543b5('bum): pa'i yid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas na/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /
543b6('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/
